I don't know if the noise went late or not because I sleep with a white-noise machine at all times. All in all, this is a comfortable and convenient spot.
This was more than I expected.  Would definitely contact Elizabeth again if I come to town.
This location is awesome.  Very funky and Upstate-ly.  Comfortable bed and plenty of fascinating decorations.  A great night stay in Albany awaits....
Always easy and comfortable
The space was clean and made you feel at home. I had the privacy I needed and appreciated the easy check-in and check-out instructions.
Great space for our night in Albany, nice quiet neighbourhood

Liz's place is a sweet very affordable quiet room with a private bath. The neighborhood is quiet and green and Liz was a responsive host. It is in a lovely old home stylistic character and charm.
It was listed as having a kitchen which does not feel accurate to me. There is a fridge, a microwave, a electric kettle to boil water but no option for pan boiling or sauteing and very minimal utensils (ex. no cutting board or cooking knives, dining plates). It also has no sink separate for the bathroom hand washing sink which would be insufficient for washing up after cooking a real meal. The place seems set up for heating up already prepared food but not for preparing food from ingredients.
Very nice quaint room in a lovely old home in a beautiful, quiet, neighborhood.  Great communication.  Highly recommend.
Nice spot -- quiet & comfortable. Elizabeth is a great host, and very communicative.
Lovely and quiet neighbourhood. Host was very responsive and helpful. Clean space and historic furnishings. Would highly recommend!
Elizabeth's place offers peace and tranquility across from a calm green park, and just a short drive to restaurants and AMC. The room has everything you need, and it's quite comfortable.

The room has a warm, quiet atmosphere, perfect for decompressing from your travels or recharging for more. For those who prefer soft lighting, the room is well suited for late night pontificating or relaxed reading.
Safe, quiet, and comfortable place to stay
Nice and quaint place. We saw a concert at the Times Union Center and it was only 15 minutes away. Would definitely recommend!

Charming, quiet space in an upscale Albany neighborhood. Liz has added so many personal touches it feels like home. I would highly recommend this place to anyone staying over in Albany looking for a tranquil out of the way spot yet in the city itself. I look forward to staying there on my next trip to Albany
Good location, comfortable couch bed, cute shower. The house is in a very quaint neighbourhood.

Very charming space in the charming New Scotland Area. Close to many businesses and reasonable distance from the NYS Thruway and Route 87.
Everything was clean, comfortable and very nice. Look forward to returning.

The house was clean and the owner Mrs. Elizabeth was very helpful and provided us with all support that we need to make my wife’s staying comfortable.
Overall experience was really good and we do recommend Mrs. Elizabeth’s studio.
Very comfortable and clean.
Very nice stay. Love the decor. Very quiet location. Handy to have a tea kettle for my use. Everything was as described and good communication. Thanks!
A lovely space. Stopped for one night while passing through but would be happy to stay for longer. Seamless check in and check out, helpful and friendly host, and excellent amenities in the studio.
Elizabeth’s house was so warm & cozy ...everything was VERY clean only thing is it is very dim ,but that wasn’t a problem for me! Thank you so much for the wonderful stay Elizabeth!
Great location in a very nice neighborhood.
Definitely a unique space!

Liz was a great host and had a lovely place. Location was in a safe, quiet neighborhood and the room had everything I needed. It was clean and accommodating. Can't wait for my stay again next week. Thanks, Liz!
Beautiful studio apartment with comforting touches, fantastic hospitality, and superb cleanliness
This was my second stay at Liz's and it was wonderful. Everything was clean and her place is warm and comfy.
Charming studio style room, in a lovely historic home! A few minutes from campus and most everything albany has to offer.
Great stay. Quiet and good location.
Nice stay
Super clean, easy to access, safe location. Highly recommend.

Communication with Liz is easy and everything was ready and available as expected and described. The clawfoot tub and chandelier were unexpected and wonderful touches.  The entire decor is lovely and welcoming.  The house is very quiet and the neighborhood is just enough removed from the busy streets that you can get a good, full night's rest.  I was only there one night for my college reunion, but I shall definitely look to stay here again when I am back in town.  The room has a hairdryer, kettle and coffeemaker, microwave and small fridge, ample lighting and seating and a large table that could double as a workspace desk if needed.
The space was just perfect. Very stylish and close to everything.

Liz’s place worked well for a quick post-conference stay. The house is older but has all of the essentials. There are others living within the building but the room/bathroom is private. The WiFi worked great, the room was clean when I arrived. The neighborhood is quiet and I felt safe. Overall a nice value and my stay went smoothly!
Beautiful
It is nice quiet and clean place. And Liz is easily to communicate and helpful.

Very cute, cozy little place in a quiet neighborhood very close to downtown. Tons of charm.
One thing I will say is that the place is old, so the doors make a decent amount of noise. Be careful if you’re checking in sometime during the evening/night.
I loved staying at Liz’s place. The whole studio was very comfortable, stylish, and there was plenty of space. No complaints at all. Definitely recommend!

I had a fantastic stay.  The check-in process was easy, the space was clean, comfortable, and full of character.  The house is located in a beautiful, quiet area and there was coffee and tea as well as a toaster, mini fridge, and microwave which made making dinner and breakfast easy.  I highly recommend staying here!!
Elizabeth's place is as pictured. It is also in a great part of town. I will definitely return.

Perfect spot to relax, pretty neighborhood, easy to get to places. She has everything you might need and is very kind. Definitely want to come back when the weather is warmer and hang out in the gazebo.
Very nice place; clean, quiet, pleasant stay. Would recommend!
Great location. Super easy check in and cozy bed.

BED BUGS ALERT!!!!!!
My first time using Airbnb and will never in my life use it. I woke up at 3am cuz i felt inching around my body when i say myself in the mirror i had huge bites. When i went to check the bed i saw a BED BUG i panic and pick ip my belongings and SLEPT IN MY CAR had no where to go mind you it was freezing. Couldnt even sleep. DO NOT GO TO THIS PLACE!!!!!!
Very convenient and affordable
Elizabeth's place is very pleasant and has lots of character. It's quite spacious for a studio apartment and is conveniently located.
Lovely, historic home with artistic touches. Great to have parking off Street in the City!
Clean and comfy place with adequate privacy. Loved the history the the host had displayed around the place. God bless.
Excellent value and very clean!
Cozy and welcoming space. Very homelike and I hope to stay again.

Elizabeth place has charm and character. And the area is quite. A great recipe for a romantic stay. Although it’s more of a privet room with a privet bath then a studio apartment and the amenities are limited we were pretty comfortable.
Charming spot in Albany with nice touches like coffee and milk. Great location.
My third time staying with Elizabeth.  Her place has such a nice vibe, it feels like home!

Red Flag🚩I wouldn’t stay here again if you paid me.🤢 host was very rude to me and my driver when we arrived. My partner and I were peeped on by her through her window, we were then asked to leave at 11pm and the host refused to issue a refund

A really comfortable bed! A really spacious table to work on. Old upstate NY charm. A pleasant couch for reading. A responsive host. Keurig coffee, an electric pot for hot water, some combination of green, black, and herbal tea selections, a mug, fridge (with miscellaneously useful things, including (my experience/use) English muffins and milk). Price point is accurate and I had a great stay!!
I keep coming back to stay because it has such a welcoming and homey feel!
Cl
Great place to stay! Not far from anything.
Very nice place
This unit is in safe quiet neighborhood with convenient parking.

This was my second stay at Elizabeth's place. The reason I went back was that this place was in a quiet neighborhood, but it was close enough to the University of Albany. This place will be my top choice if I have to stay in Albany again in the future.
A beautifully decorated and furnished period room with everything I could have asked for. Highly recommended.
Elizabeth's place was nice, affordable and quiet. Would definitely stay there again.
Great quiet location with off street parking

Thank you
Just the place I needed for the nice.

Nice cozy little spot to stay! Loved the clawfoot tub and the room itself was a good size and the bed wasnt bad! The cable seemed to cut in and out alot but outside of that it was everything i needed!!!!
A lovely old space, with character and comfort!  And a real deal for the prime location!
The place is immaculate, the bed is so so comfortable. An excellent selection for your next stay in Albany.
Great room!

No kitchen. There’s a door in the apartment leading to her apartment which is creepy! Felt uneasy staying there.. Good for a short stay if you don’t need to cook & don’t want privacy. Also I canceled the reservation and checked out early and she didn’t want to refund me my money for all the days I wasn’t staying there. Wouldn’t recommend.

Liz gave clear instructions. Located in a nice quiet neighborhood. The room was so cozy and homey. Both the bed and couch were extremely comfortable. Perfect place to stay for a weekend. If I ever need a place to stay in Albany I wouldn't hesitate to come back here.
The space is very clean accommodating and convenient
The place was very stylish and cozy

My room is wonderful.  It’s in a very quiet, nice neighborhood and I have everything I need ie. comfortable bed, tv and little kitchen area.  Elizabeth is very friendly and accommodating.  I’m so happy I found this place!!
Very nice, quaint little studio apartment. Within walking distance of the hospital. Liz was a very accommodating host and I would definitely stay here again anytime!
Adorable space for an amazing value! Lovely home, lovely host, gorgeous area. We truly enjoyed our stay.
A great location near Saint Peter’s Hospital convenient parking in a safe neighborhood
SUPER charming with everything you need whether you stay in or go out.
Awesome place
I had a great time at Liz's place. The apartment was homey and cozy, the bed was very comfortable.  I would love to stay here again on my next trip to Albany.
Great place, couldn't have asked for better.
Nice, clean and stylish place. I really enjoyed my stay
Great location and quiet atmosphere! Clean and nice!
Charming and a great value. Check in was simple. This was our second time. There may be more!!
Stayed here to divide up a long drive.  The place is clean and close to a pretty good pizza place.  Would definitely recommend.
Cozy spot! Definitely recommend for a quick, one-night stay in Albany!
Great value
Liz was very responsive and helpful. I would have liked to have more time to hear her stories. Great location. The studio had everything needed and loved the decoration ... and garden!
Sick place!
Cozy. Quiet. Two things needed for a great airbnb. This place is all that.
Lovely place!
Lovely property and close to shops, etc.  Hostess very accommodating. Would definitely stay again.
Elizabeth’s place was great! Very nice neighborhood, clean, comfortable and private. I will stay here again next time I’m in town!
I enjoyed my stay ☺️
Great stay for what I needed. Elizabeth responds to messages and communication was easy. Nice and cozy.

Lovely home in a charming, green neighborhood. The unit itself (a converted living room) is beautifully decorated (the photos don’t do it justice) and extremely comfortable for a solo traveler or a couple looking to explore the region. The area feels a bit suburban, but is a short drive to some cute restaurants, and not far at all from downtown. And the price point can’t be beat! Highly highly recommend.
Nice place! The house is charming, flowers all around and a front porch to die for! The neighborhood is very nice to walk in. Liz is very responsive and extremely helpful.

Elizabeth’s place was excellently located and comfortably furnished. She was very responsive and flexible with check in and the space was clean and quiet. For the price it was unbeatable and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a central but cozy spot in Albany.
The best !!
Super cute!

This unique place is located in a beautiful neighborhood near a pond and park and highly recommended for anyone that wants to go for a evening stroll. There are some unique space is on the property that aren’t seen in the photographs and I found it charming.
Great accommodation in a small quiet neighborhood that surprisingly close to amenities. Definitely a must if you're looking for a pleasant,enjoyable and affordable stay.
Excellent stay! Liz was excellent, thoughtful, and attentive. Her house is beautiful, and very comfortable. Very much needed restful getaway.
Great location, being close to the highway. Very homey with great decorations. Had everything I needed for a comfortable nights stay!

A little slice of heaven! Elizabeth is an excellent host with the most charming studio. Clean, quiet, lovingly decorated, delicious claw foot tub and a garden straight out of a fairy tale. Beautiful neighborhood, convenient & safe, off-street parking; I can’t say enough about this place!
Great location, and all the basics you need--great for a single traveler or even couple.

I was amazed at all of the special touches that Elizabeth had in the apartment as well as the beautiful outside gardens and places to sit and relax. The location was perfect for my needs to get in and out of Albany. It was safe, COVID clean, and quiet. Couldn't have asked for a better place to stay at such a reasonable rate.
Really cute, quiet place. The room was bigger than I expected and the bed was comfy. Elizabeth is very sweet and quick to respond.

Elizabeth's studio for rent is lovely and very tastefully decorated. The house is on a quiet street and has a beautiful, peaceful yard. I was only in town overnight but this would be a good place to stay for a few days, it is spacious and comfortable. Elizabeth was very communicative and accommodated me on short notice. I really appreciated that the bedding does not have a strong detergent smell... This would be a good place if you are sensitive to fragrance/chemicals. There is a WiFi router next to the bed that appears to be for the other units as well as this one. I moved it away from the bed while sleeping. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a restful stay in Albany!

This is an AirBnb to beat all AirBnbs! Charming comfortable interiors and wonderful and fun exteriors. Very convenient to highways in a classic suburban neighborhood setting. Elizabeth couldn't be nicer!
Elizabeth’s room was incredibly comfortable and beautifully decorated. Clean, quiet, well stocked with anything I needed. I would definitely come back!
Beautiful area and very nice neighborhood,  space has very nice historical and familial paintings and things.
Great place to stay. Very comfortable. In a quiet neighborhood,  close to everything.
A very nice and comfortable place to stay.  Plenty of space, a nice quiet neighborhood to take a walk in and easy to get to.
Elizabeth's place is very comfortable and cozy. She has all the right touches and is in a very nice neighborhood.  Very close to any thing in Albany.

The perfect place to land on a business trip. Felt like I just walked into a family member's home. Great neighborhood, a small park across the street, and plenty of food and stores a quick walk away. Most of all this is an astounding value, I will check here first anytime I am in Albany.
Second time was just as good as the first.  Love this spot.
Good luck
Staying in Elizabeth's place is always relaxing and comfortable.  I have stayed here several times.
I have been staying at Liz's place almost every week. Definitely book it if you can.
once again it was a lovely time the accommodations were great The place was spotless so easy to get in and out great location recommended highly.
Definitely stay with Liz if I am not already booked in.
Definitely the comfortable, quiet place to stay when visiting Albany.

Liz’s place was wonderful. Close to the airport and great food options, clean, and a unique experience like stepping back in time with the decor. I’d go back in a heartbeat. Highly recommend Liz’s accommodations.
stay here. good place
great place, quiet and comfortable
If I have not booked it or her other room is open, definitely stay here. comfortable and quiet.
Make sure you Stay with Liz if visiting Albany. comfortable and quiet. nice neighborhood.
Definitely stay with Liz. Awesome place. Very much home away from home.

Really nice place to stay! Unique style, easy check-in, and a really nice host. It's a studio apartment inside of an entire house, so it doesn't feel like the most private place, but that didn't dampen the trip in the slightest.
A great place to stay in Albany. Quiet and comfortable.  If you don't stay here while visiting Albany  you are missing out.
Cozy and welcoming home. Lovely stay thank you!
My daughter loved the place and Elizabeth as well. She said that the whole vibe was cozy (:

Great stay at Elizabeth's place! A cute and cosy historic house. The studio itself had everything you need. The neighborhood is quiet. Ample space for parking in front of the house. I recommend it if you find yourself in Albany!
Elizabeth's space is quaint and perfect for a weekend trip to Albany!

It's really tastefully decorated and, for the price, you just can't beat it!  It's centrally located if you want to be in the capital district of New York.  It's quiet and quaint, yet classy and chic!  It felt spacious for a studio apartment, and I was very safe and comfortable in Albany, an city that does have some not-so-safe-and-comfortable areas.  All in all, it was a pleasure.  I definitely recommend!!
great place to stay!
Amazing value for a nice little stay! Easy in and out and great location
great stay!
Great place, great location, very hospitable. Would absolutely recommend.
This is a lovely space to stay on a very peaceful street.  There was a more room in the space than it appears in the pictures.  I really enjoyed by stay there!
Fantastic location, near downtown Albany with beautiful garden. Spacious and peaceful
Convenient location at valuable cost.

The house is listed as “entire house to yourself” when in fact you share the house with other guests. You do have the studio space to yourself, but there are others in the house with you. The host did not clarify that she would be on the property. Her room/apartment is on the other side of the studio space which made me uncomfortable. Although she specified no animals, she herself owns a dog. Such information should be articulated in the listing.
Great stay and great location!
Nice quiet location with off-street parking.  Unit is spacious and comfortable.

Liz was an outstanding host.  The house and property were out of the 1800s mixed with the quirkiness of an artist.  Birds and nature surround the home with an outdoor bohemian-like retreat.  The room itself had the comfort of home with the majestic design of the Victorian-era.  I loved this experience.
Wonderful charming place 😊
A charming studio suite, just close enough to downtown to be convenient and just far enough away to be quiet!

Liz was great as a hostess! She communicates quickly, efficiently and in fact, was even there to meet me on my first day checking in. Her apt has its own private bathroom with shower and a little sofa area along with a table and work area. There is a kitchenette with little fridge and microwave as well as electric kettle. Liz had kindly left some spreads, bread and milk for me!! Her apt is easy to access and the bed is comfortable. There is parking on the driveway and street. Although across from hospital, not noisy at all and quite a cute neighborhood!! Location is within walking distance to a CVS and cafe little further down the street, if needed!

Lovely antique home in a nice neighborhood. The studio is about the size of a hotel suite, quite comfortable and very cute.  Cleaner than most Airbnb’s and hotels i  the price range as well.  Perfect for a quick stay, especially if you love the architecture of Albany!
Elizabeth's home is lovely and in a beautiful neighborhood.  The vintage decor makes it a unique spot to stay next time you're in Albany.
Amazing place! Easy, accessible, nice, vintage.

Liz has a cozy private apartment in Albany, only few minutes from freeway entrance. It is within walking distance to coffee shops. The apartment has heat and air conditioning. There is a bathtub with shower. Good wifi. I have had zoom meetings there without issues. Kitchenette with many essentials including microwave and mini fridge. Would recommend!!
Cool space for the lonely work traveler or adventuring couple. Definitely take advantage of the provided bath salts and draw up a nice hot bath in the old school peg leg bathtub.
Charming, thoughtfully decorated space with easy checkin and a kind, communicative host. I stayed for a night's stopover during a road trip and enjoyed it. Highly recommended.
Private space, great location.
Nice comfortable quiet very pleasant neighborhood
A real gem. Even better in person. Quiet clean comfortable great location super fast WiFi parking excellent value. Highly recommend.

What a charming house, Its an old style apartment as part of a house.  It might not be for anyone noise sensitive as you hear pretty much everything.  I would plan to come back in later evening.  But thats part of the price.
Location and off street parking is perfect
Gracious host, clean place and quiet neighborhood!
Elizabeth is the best host communicator I've encountered through Air B and B. She offers a comfy bed in a lovely old home. Quiet location.
Great quiet Albany location. Spacious apt with beautiful garden.
Exactly as depicted, spacious and quiet!
Charming, old house. Was clean and well-kept!
Very cute place, the surrounding area is beautiful! Close to a lot while being in a quiet neighborhood. Very cozy!
One of my go-to places when traveling to Albany.  A comfortable apartment in a nice neighborhood with a covered porch that is very peaceful.
great place and great location 👍🏼
Such a beautiful home!! The apartment is really cozy and the backyard is beyond gorgeous!!
Nice stay in a nice neighborhood!
I absolutely loved staying at Liz’s place! I would definitely recommend it to anyone and will certainly be staying here again when in Albany.

Liz’s place met my needs in every way. Her studio is conveniently located for an overnight on a long road trip. Easy access, clean and safe. Grocery store just minutes away. Peaceful surroundings. I would definitely stay there again.
Such a wonderful place to stay while visiting Albany! Nice little quiet place to stay while still being extremely close to everything Albany has to offer.
Lovely, clean, excellent location, and equipped with so many thoughtful touches.

Quite a unique airbnb. Spacious studio, unusually furnished, comfy bed, lovely host and thoughtful touches. Be sure you get the correct set of keys as there are two studios. The garden  and swimming pool are an added bonus. The location is convenient, just Off New Scotland  near hospitals and colleges. Off a quiet park. I certainly will stay here again.

Elizabeth's place was exactly as described. It was clean and comfortable. I was just there for a quick overnight stay but I got to use the pool at 6am in the morning before I left and it was really nice!
Elizabeth’s place was extremely comfortable and in a great location. Highly recommended.
Very comfortable space in a beautiful old house. Extremely easy check in and communication. Great value. Highly recommend
Nice place to stay with reasonable price.
Was a great host  and had a great location.
I picked this place because it was quiet, yet close to everything. I also love the private bathroom.

Great place! I had a very short stay -- checked in quite late (rather bedraggled, after a rather long, rainy walk) and checked out very early the next morning, but had a wonderfully comfortable stay in between. The suite is spacious and well-fitted-out ... and I especially appreciated the little touches like snacks (I was also quite hungry by the time I arrived, and loath to go back out in the rain!), tea/coffee, etc. Communications and access were all clear and simple. The unit is within the larger house, but completely private. Will happily stay again!
This was a great place for the value! The decor is fun and the space is really clean and comfortable. Great quiet street near everything in Albany!

Perfect place to land for the night.  Great space, cozy and clean.  Host was easy to communicate with.  Bed was comfortable and having the extra touches like coffee and a toaster to use in the morning was a bonus.  Highly recommend!
Elizabeth’s place was comfortable and clean. It is in a safe and quiet neighborhood. I highly recommend her place.
Super cool Victorian era room and bathroom. Very comfortable and in a quiet neighborhood it was wonderful.

I felt very welcome in Liz's studio! I was looking for a relaxing night after a weekend of racing and i had everything I needed. I even had some breakfast items provided which was a sweet personal touch. I appreciated the space. Good location, quiet, gives you a good feel for Albany.
This is a lovely space in a nice quiet neighborhood,  all the things you need are available, bedding was soft and cozy, there’s a fridge, microwave and tea kettle. Claw foot tub in the bathroom!
Great tranquil spot in good location if you have a car
definitely will book next time i need a place to stay and it’s available! super flexible host and great communication!

Liz’s place was great! Clean, great value, and safe location. The ONLY reason I’m not giving it a 5 star is because the other residents in the house were quite loud all through the night waking me multiple times with slamming doors and such. Other than that, I had a great stay for a quick overnight trip for work. Thanks!

Liz's apartment is very clean and cozy.
I loved the decor! She thoughtfully provides coffee, tea, English muffins and jam. So, no need to go out for brekkie. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay there.
I would definitely stay there again.
Great place to relax after a day of travel or business. Wonderful host would stay again

The perfect place for a trip to albany! So cozy and amazing! Couldn’t ask for better.

Really cute place. Clean and had everything we needed. Love the wallpaper!
Great place. Spacious and cozy. Nice neighborhood and great price!
Elizabeth's place is damn near perfect. Great price, great location, and such a nice studio apartment. Really great bang for your buck!

Charming, cozy, central location, and a great deal! This was my second stay at Liz's place and I will stay again.
It's a great place to stay a night. I loved the decor.

A great stay.  Very comfortable and it met all of my needs.
The perfect solution for a stay in the Albany area.  Great location, clean, outstanding amenities!  The host was incredibly responsive and confirmed my request in just a few hours.

The perfect place to rest your head.  The house was in a wonderful location if you have a college student and I need somewhere to stay.  Safe and comfortable.  Definitely recommend to others!!

Liz's studio was a perfect place to stay! Comfortable, private, cute and cozy! Communication was fast and smooth. The decor was beautiful and I really enjoyed the ambience. There was accessible coffee and english muffins in the fridge for the morning, which I appreciated! I will definitely plan to book another stay when I need to be in Albany again. Thank you, Liz!
A neat and comfortable bedroom . Really quiet and well kept . Tons of parking room . Elizabeth was very courteous and was a breeze to communicate with .
Very homey & quaint, I felt very safe & comfortable here! Clean, quiet & lovely!

Perfect

Great stay as always. Well worth it!
Great for value. Quiet. Very clean and private. Comes with its own attached bathroom and appliances.

I have been traveling to Albany for several weeks for work, and have stayed at Liz's place several times. Her place is the only one I have stayed at more than once. I will look forward to staying at her place again soon!
I love this place ! Very cozy and location very good!
Wondering place!
Very comfy bed and apt.
Elizabeth's place was really beautiful and homey. I always look to book her place when it is available.

A+. I have an excellent stay every time I come here. I frequently travel to Albany, and stay at Liz's place every time it's available. The accommodations are as advertised and Liz is an excellent hostess.
Elizabeth’s place was lovely.
Great stay! Recommend it!
Cozy little gem in a residential neighborhood!

Elizabeth's place was fantastic. Great location, clean, quiet, comfortable, all in all just what I needed. I'm also grateful for her flexibility with the check in time as I work nights. Looking forward to staying again.

Beautiful room, very comfortable.
As always a great visit. Elizabeth is a great host.

Beautiful and a great price! Will return!

A great stay as always!
calm, charming, cozy, warm, peaceful, relaxing are just a few words that come to mind.   A great value in a great location with an awesome host.

a wonderful host!!
Great stay as always. Elizabeth is a great host.

It is always a pleasure to stay at Liz’s place. She has a lovely home!
Very cozy. Attentive host. Within walking distance to St. Peter’s hospital.
An amazing stay as always! Liz’s place is very adorable and she even left ice coffee in the fridge for me! Very nice touch, thank you!
I have stayed here before.  Elizabeth is a great communicator and the house is perfect for a quiet overnight stay.  Will definitely be back again!
Always a pleasure staying at Liz's place! ALWAYS clean, communication is great and I appreciate all of her accommodations! ❤️
Liz was great and her place was a perfect place to stay for a business trip to Albany. The bed was extremely comfortable.
Good, clean place to stay while in Albany. We’ve been there twice and have no complaints. The host’s breakfast items were very appreciated!
Liz's place is a steal. The decor and home are very sophisticated and for a great price. Liz is very on top of communication, access was a breeze. No issues at all.
Great little spot to rest my head at night after classes. Liz was nice and had the room prepared for me. It was comfy and relaxing.
Excellent stay great host!
Liz has a beautiful home. I highly recommend!
A very cozy suite, and the place was easy to find.
Liz had the perfect place at the perfect price for me to stop and spend the night on my way home to MA from my WV vacation.

I’ve stayed numerous times at Liz’s! Always a comfortable and cozy stay. My last time staying I was surprised with a new bed to slumber on. Very comfy. Claw foot tub has got water for a nice soak after a long day.
Nice room with good wi-fi, comfy bed, and plenty of fridge space.  Easy to find and get in to.
Perfect stopover

The location is excellent and the place is very clean, though a bit dark.
A kitchen light didn’t turn off when I first tried, but later on it did. Had trouble falling asleep one night due to noisy neighbors.
You will like Liz. She does everything she can to make things right.

Liz’s home is in a nice, quaint neighborhood which surrounds a small park lit by gas lanterns. I went walking there after dark and had no concerns for my safety. The studio in Liz’s home is large and comfortable. The bed is amazing! There’s plenty of refrigerator space and even a bona fide freezer, great for freezing ice packs for the next day‘s journey. The window air conditioner and room fan kept the inside temperature very comfortable on a muggy summer night. I stayed only one night at the studio while passing through Albany, and would do so again if my future travel brings me this way.
Its a very nice and cozy place 🤗

Elizabeth’s place was perfect! It was exactly what I was looking for, and as described. Everything was clean and comfortable, check in was easy. The neighborhood was cute and it was an easy uber to downtown. I would definitely stay here again!
Place was amazing, I would highly recommend

A superb place to stay, Liz adds a real personal touch to the visit. The room is well set up and communication is prompt. If I'm in Albany again, I will certainly be back.

I had gotten into some car issues before check in, and with tow truck issues I last minute could only get to this location at 3:30am. Despite that, check in was extremely easy. I found all these hand written notes as guidance as well in the room. Bed was super comfy, and the zen garden was a beautiful surprise after a long stressful night. Will definitely be back!
Great host, highly recommend staying here if your ever in the area

A nice stay, private, quiet, very nice neighbourhood.

By far the most beautiful air bnb I have ever stayed in! Beautiful home for a great price. Thank you for being so accommodating during my stay.

Such a gorgeous victorian house. I’m grateful to have been allowed me to spend the night such short notice. Elizabeth’s garden and decor are eclectic and lovely. Great accommodations, easy to get in, and thorough communication. Would highly recommend!
Only stayed for one night while visiting my son at UAlbany, but tbe place was great, very comfortable, affordable and very clean. Exactly what i was looking for. Will definitely stayed there agaim.
Nice and affordable place to stay while attending a wedding nearby.
Great place, has everything you need for a short to medium stay. Nice quiet location too!
Elizabeth is a lovely woman and a great host. Her home is perfectly located, warm and welcoming.

This is a great airbnb. Spacious and comfortable studio with everything needed.
This is a beautiful neighborhood, safe and convenient. Check in was very easy and host is very responsive. Will stay again when in the area.
Cute, clean and charming. Easy check in. Quiet building and neighborhood. Comfy bed and very nice sheets!  The studio is perfect for my quick overnights.

Liz's is studio apartment is beautiful and the bed linen was AMAZING. It was great to crawl into such a nice and comfy bed after a long day! Thank you. The check in was easy peasy and it was nice to be able to have some coffee and a snack in the morning before I left. Location is great. Perfect for a one night stay.
Another great stay!
Very nice spacious  private place in an  old Victorian home.  Safe area! Very reasonable which was important to me .  Thank you Liz!!!
Great stay! Nice and quiet and attentive host!

What a wonderful place. I found it to be absolutely perfect. Lovely, clean, cozy, slept so peacefully in thos comfortable studio.
Liz's place is in a great peaceful location near everything.  Her apartment is comfy and love the convenient check-in. Off street parking is also nice. Enjoyed my stay.
Had a comfortable stay in this beautiful AirBnB.

Great spot to stay, with a lot of thought put in by Elizabeth. Would stay again.

Amazing clean place, quick and easy communication with host. Only small issue was that it was a bit hard to find became the house’s numbers aren’t visible at night. But Elizabeth responded immediately to my phonecalls for help. Great host, great stay. Will be back again!
very nice and cozy place

Very good place to stay with ample parking. Highly recommend!

awesome place to stay the night. the bed was super comfortable

Such a wonderful, cozy little home away from home. Loved my multiple stays here. Very comfortable, great atmosphere, one of the nicest beds I have ever slept in. It's just a wonderful place to rest your head and recharge, and such a great bargain.  Highly recommend.

I had a comfortable overnight stay and sleep at Elizabeth’s place. It’s a lovely space in a convenient central location with some nice welcoming touches (such as a little coffee and tea bar). I enthusiastically recommend Elizabeth’s place to fellow travellers to Albany.
Everything was exactly as expected from the pictures, description, and review. Thank you, Elizabeth!
I have no problem recommending this place to stay!  Elizabeth is a very nice host as well! Thank you for helping to make both my trips to Albany successful!
Place was perfect if your looking for a cheap and reliable crash for a night or 2. Place was clean upon arrival and listed as described.
Great place. Would recommend it if you’re in the area!!

I had a great time Staying at Liz place for about a month. I love how it’s quiet, comfortable bed and I felt safe. Liz is great host, she made sure I have everything I needed. Highly recommend her place
very cute room and thr bathtub was perfect!
Stayed a couple of nights, served my needs.
Comfortable stay, great area

Elizabeth’s place was very comfortable. Stayed there when I was on call and it had everything I needed. At first there was a confusion regarding the room assignment but it was quickly resolved with the help of the other AirBnb guests, very nice couple. Will definitely recommend and stay there again during my call weekends. Thanks Elizabeth!❤️
Great stay, would definitely recommend to friends and family!
excellent stay at Liz's place. Perfect for a quiet night sleep.

I have stayed here twice now, it's a great spot. This little studio apartment is in an old Victorian and has lots of charm. It is helpful to have a mini-fridge, microwave, and kettle available for use. The room is not particularly sound-proof so folks sensitive to noise may be occasionally disturbed by noise from the adjacent apartments.

I had a very pleasant stay w Elizabeth. Beautiful, quiet neighborhood & a very cozy room (fabulous bed). I loved the decor. With the brochures of local restaurants, dinner was easy. I had a short stay, but I could easily have stayed longer. Great value. I highly recommend.
Really amazing place and excellent location.

Liz’s place was in a nice neighborhood close to places to eat and the bus that goes downtown. It was a nice studio with a comfy bed, kitchenette, table, private bathroom, and window nook. I felt right at home. Easy check-in via lockbox next to the front door. The porch is also beautiful!
It was a pleasure staying at Elizabeth's. The location and privacy was perfect for me.  The space was bigger than I imagined it.
Always had a great stay!! Highly recommend this place
Elizabeth’s place fulfilled what I needed for a weekend👍🏼
Thank you for another great stay!

This is probably one of the nicest Airbnb spaces I've stayed in. The gardens are absolutely exquisite. I didn't have any interaction with the host, and that's okay everything worked out smoothly and it was a wonderful stay!
Adorable little spot. Great value. Comfortable bed and cute bathtub.

Great place for the price, but there is a strong smell of dogs and a lot of dog fur/dander in the apartment. While not allergic, I was very itchy and needed to shower pretty quickly after entering. Still, the space was as advertised, had private parking, was clean, and pretty quiet. Great for the value if you are okay with dog hair/small.
This place was great: clean, quiet, comfortable, and private. I loved the historic home and the tasteful eclectic decor. I wish I could have stayed longer.
Elizabeth's place is very quiet and comfortable. The location is very close to everything you would need. The studio was very clean and well maintained. Would definitely recommend!!!!
The studio was very quiet and comfortable. Would recommend!
Liz is a pleasant host. We have stayed here before with a larger accommodation. We would stay again. The location was excellent for our purposes.
Perfect place for the perfect price. Would one hundred percent stay here again.
Room was very clean and quiet. Would definitely recommend!!

This place is full of charm, has everything you need plus some! The garden is a hidden delight, complete with a pool. I biked into the city and that's very do-able with the bike lanes and quiet streets nearby.
easy to find and attractive accommodations in Albany NY. I highly recommend this place
Terrific place
Elizabeth's place is always very clean and quiet. Very nice place to stay

I had a great stay at Elizabeth’s Airbnb. The room matched the pictures and it was an amazing value. If you visit, make sure you pick the right room when you enter - she has 2 Airbnb spaces across the hall from each other.
This was my first Airbnb experience and it was exactly what I expected . It was quiet and peaceful.
Real nice ,clean,  comfortable,  and quiet stay in Albany. Highly recommend it!

This would be a lot more worth it if you brought 4 or 5 people for a full 12 hours. Like, you could split it four ways and all sleep comfortably; I was just intrigued by a positive review of icy AC.
As one person, who wasn’t there longer than 5 hours, this was such a blessing and oasis. It felt like a luxurious splurge. Really clear directions how to get in. Thank you!
Great place, great location.
The room was very nice and large. The bed was very comfortable and the shower had good pressure and temperature. Enjoyed my stay.
I didn’t get to see Elizabeth but the room was comfy and the communication went well! The neighborhood is really peaceful

The studio was immaculate and spacious, lovely AirBnb apartment equipped with everything you need. A great  bed and beautiful bathroom. Perfect little kitchenette with everything you need. The decor was beautiful, European country cottage vibe ❤️ Elizabeth is a great host and there when you need her at anytime,  quick to respond . The garden area is so peaceful and serene. I wish I could have stayed longer! I will definitely be back.
It was so nice and I felt at home. Very comfy and cozy.
I checked in very late + checked out very early but the process was quick and easy! I had a great stay!
I wish I could have stayed longer. The room and yard were lovely. The park across the street was lush. I enjoyed my stay at Elizabeth's.
I always stay at Liz’s place when I am in Albany visiting my son. Very quiet area. The room is very nice as well, and has what you need for an enjoyable stay.
Very cute and cozy studio.  The bed was so comfortable! Beautiful garden and interior touches.  Felt just like staying with a close relative. Would stay again if I'm in the area!
Great stay as always. Highly recommend!
Great spot to lay my head with all the extras. Thanks Liz!
Loud noises at 2am still. Otherwise, it was nice. Peaceful area. Very nice host.
Excellent stay on a work trip. Would definitely book again.

Cute, quaint, and quiet. Wallpaper and paintings and clutter (including collection of unwatchable VCRs - sadly no books!) give it a feel of staying at a grandparent's house. The place was very easy to find, right off the highway, and the location was lovely and calm for a brief overnight stay. Would have appreciated a porch light when arriving at night, but the directions were clear and easy to follow. The nearby neighborhood seem to be charming.
Enjoyed my stay, perfect!
Great place to stay
Very clean and comfortable room. Check in was very easy. Would definitely recommend!!
Elizabeth's place is always very clean and comfortable and the location is very quiet.  Check in was very simple also!
Great instructions and beautiful environment. The studio has everything u need
really good price
Easy Check-In.  Great Private Location.  Spacious Room. Very Affordable. Checked all the boxes!
Elizabeth's place was great as usual!!!
Great stay! Private, affordable and comfortable.

I hate to be the one to leave a bad review, but I arrived to the place at night first and foremost once there I put the key code in to get the key and the key wasn’t there! I call and texted the host several times to no avail, I sat outside for 45 mins contacting Airbnb support who also couldn’t get in touch with the host! I end up sitting outside for 1.5 hours before someone finally came! This when it gets worst the person who responds wasn’t even the and had to go find a key to open the studio ! Worst experience of my life!
Great spot for my overnight work trip. Nice and unique space that was comfortable, private, and easy access
Beautiful old house, charming decor. Clean, quiet and comfortable. Close to a lovely bit of green space.
Great value, responsive host, good instructions for access to the home. Beautiful neighborhood. I would stay here again!
clean, comfortable, efficient for my needs
See my review from 10/13-14 stay.Booked the room for a second night.Nothing else need be said.

I just completed my 2nd stay with Elizabeth,and have now resided in both the red and blue room.Well appointed,gazebo and pool closed for the season (but I was able to stroll around it for the first time)curtains were drawn to black out the room and hold back the night chill common for this time of year.
She had some new menus that I didn't know about or tried (started University here in '75),which came in very handy after a long day's journey into night for each of the 2 I stayed.Great to sit outside on her porch during warm afternoons, curl up with a book either there or the couch near the windows and curtains which overlook it.
Surrounding counties and their respective charms are ready for perusal, and occup a large round table I found very useful for my working vacation.

The studio was spacious and well-equipped. The vintage style is kind of fun but rather busy, and the space gets very little daylight so it can feel rather oppressive. The area is a pleasant, residential part of the city so felt nice and safe but (and this is my fault for not doing my research properly) not terribly convenient for travellers without their own transport. The nearest supermarket is about 25 minutes' walk away and there are very few cafes or shops close by. There are regular buses into the city centre, though, so for a short stay that wouldn't be such a problem. The host didn't really respond to messages which caused me some difficulties in planning my travel arrangements.
Very comfortable and quiet arrangement. Highly recommend.
Quiet and  comfy!
Honestly 10/10 Will stay there every time I’m in Albany if available!
I was in Albany overnight and Elizabeth room was just what I needed.
The studio felt homey, has everything you might need and I had a relaxing stay.
It’s such a lovely space! Just passed through but would definitely stay longer next time I’m in town! Highly recommend.

Liz’s place was so cozy and comfortable for my stay, her instructions we very detailed and helped me as I arrived when it was dark. I would highly recommend her adorable studio.
It’s close to so many things in Albany.
Worst host . Not responsive at all . Extremely careless .had a very bad experience with her

It was a great place to stay.
Thanks
Short but great stay.  Very large for a studio apartment.   Comfy bed.

This air bnb studio apartment was one of the best places I have stayed in for the money.  The studio apartment is in a quiet residential neighborhood, but yet close to restaurants, the Palace Theater, and the MVP Arena.  I was able to make coffee in the morning, as well as eat  a small breakfast. (much appreciated Liz; you have thought of everything). I would stay here again in the future. I wouldn't think of staying anywhere else when in the Albany area.
What a magical beautiful place.  Everything was easy and well worth the money. Thank you!
Excellent place. Perfect location and space.
Antique style, murder mystery feel. Eerie but comfortable.
We had such a great experience we stayed at both her places. Absolutely beautiful and very nice place.

The studio section of the house was equipped with refrigerator, microwave and napkins were thoughtfully kept there
The restroom was pretty clean.
The lights were a little dim for the room but that is a no issue
Old house but well kept.
Elizabeth was kind enough to allow me late checkin. I stayed for 2 nights and would recommend this anytime
We couldn’t have been happier.
This cozy studio and attentive host provide a classic bed and breakfast experience.
Great stay !
Very peaceful and a great place to stay!! Thank you
Elizabeth was an unkind person, after providing very poor and ambiguous instructions to check in. Steer clear of her mental illness, for your own sake.
This is my third stay at Elizabeth’s. No complaints, she’s wonderful and her place is just what I need during my weekends on call.
I cannot believe anyone would say anything unkind about Elizabeth. She was kind, extremely responsive and the room was super quaint.
Lovely cozy stay.
Responsive host and great value.
Only place I stay when in Albany. Like home.
Thank you Elizabeth. Definitely a place I would go back if I am in the area.

The "studio" I stayed in was exactly as pictured and described. It was a spacious room with its own full bathroom, which included useful amenities for those who forgot their own (i.e., toothpaste, shampoo, etc.), a table and chairs, sofa and a tiny "kitchenette" of a microwave, mini fridge, toaster oven and hot pot, as well as a basket of snacks and oatmeal. Paper plates, cups and utensils were also provided. The place overall was quiet and private and had light-blocking drapes so it was easy to sleep in. Guests should be aware that there is another guest "studio" across the hall, and they share an entrance but nothing else; Liz also has an apartment adjoining the room, but I hardly heard anything from her side of the door we shared. Also, the house is old and is heated by old-fashioned hot water heaters that, while quieter than the clanging hot water heaters I grew up with, do make occasional noise (the first time I heard it, I thought there was a mouse in my room!).
Great little place in Albany. Definitely would recommend to others. A few walkable restaurants and many other things within a short drive. Host was great. Place was clean.

Great place to stay - perfect place to crash the night before an early morning flight. Easy to find, very friendly and responsive host, and everything I needed all in one place. Super comfy bed, lots of character, and easy process all around. Great little place to stay if you’re passing through Albany - would stay again :)
Elizabeth’s place is a lifesaver every time I’m on call on a weekend👍🏼
Lovely space in a quiet neighborhood, just as Elizabeth described.
Beautiful room and everything went smoothly! Would stay here again
Feels like home
I love staying at Elizabeth's studio apartment. The decorations, amenities and supplies are great. I love the mattress and blanket. They are super comfy. I am definitely coming back.
Clean and comfortable place to stay!
Great place

Amazing place. Probably the best Airbnb I have ever stayed at. The interior is beautiful and feels like you’re right at home. The amenities are amazing too. Complete with tea, hot water kettle, fridge, oatmeal packets, it’s so thoughtful. I loved this place and I know you’ll love this place too.
Stayed here twice. Loved it both times. Amazing place, definitely stay here if you’re in Albany!
Super comfortable stay

Elizabeth’s house is lovely! It’s a large space, old Victorian, big windows, I really liked it. Exactly like the photos. It’s a little cold there’s a note about not turning up the heat too high because of the connected radiators but there were blankets around. The bed was so warm, cozy and comfortable: great thick bedding, I slept wonderfully. Tv and nice late check out time. It’s a quiet neighbourhood, easy to find and park. There was tea, coffee, oatmeal and breakfast bars which was a nice extra touch. Close drive to lots of places nearby. I would stay again if in the area. Thanks Elizabeth!
The place was exactly as the photos, safe location.
Clean and comfortable place and an easy check in!!!
beautifully decorated, cozy room! check in/out instructions were clear and simple. I had a great time! :)
Perfectly lovely

Elizabeth’s place was just as shown in the photos - decorated to suit a Victorian home, with lovely antique tables and pictures and a claw foot bathtub. My goal while there was to focus on a book on writing and it was a perfect spot for it - quiet and peaceful. I’ll be back next time I need some uninterrupted time to write!

Very responsive and kind host.  Tempurpedic mattress.  Scented detergent. Funky and fun decoration.  Deep tub tho very short (3 feet maybe?).  Excellent price point.  Great space for a short stay.  Would def stay there again.

FIVE STARS! I had a great stay at Elizabeth's place. The communication was super easy and quick & the place looks exactly like it does in the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located and quiet! Would absolutely recommend staying there! If you get the opportunity to speak with Elizabeth, all the luckier for you as the lilting Irish accent is awesome to listen to!
Lovely studio for a stay in a nice neighborhood in Albany. Easy access to highways
Great place to stay

Charming and unique accommodations in a pretty and quiet neighbourhood! Had everything you needed! Great fridge, microwave, and coffee/toaster oven combo. Nice and private bathroom! Definitely recommend!
Another great stay,  nice room, quiet , clean , and comfortable bed. Quick to Response. Highly recommend this place
Always a pleasant stay. Elizabeth is responsive and welcoming. Quiet stress free stay. Softest bed on the planet.
One of my favorite place to stay in Albany, quite, comfy start and clean sheet and towels every week, host is amazing highly recommend this place
Elizabeth’s studio was exactly what I needed. Comfortable, clean, and in the perfect location for my weekend stay. I  hope to stay with you again in the future. Thanks again!
This was an excellent/relaxing place to stay! Nice and quiet neighborhood. Pleasant house with character. Host was helpful and communicative/avail. if needed.
Elizabeth’s place was exactly what I expected. Felt like home. Sweet little apartment.
This stay was great! Elizabeth was a great host, and everything was very easy, accessible, and understandable!

This is one of the most awesome Airbnbs I have stayed at. The host had thought of  everything, great furnishings , great amenities, and made staring there as easy as it gets. Would recommend highly. Only stayed one night, but I will definitely be back!
great place near the airport! very comfortable and clean.
Exactly what I needed, clean, safe, comfortable, easy to find, off street parking. Comfortable bed, AC, coffee. Thanks very much

This place is absolutely perfect. For me this is a quiet, adorable place to come to that fits my needs. A bed, “mini” kitchen ( that has a mini /fridge freezer combo, microwave, toaster oven, drip coffee pot, tea pot,  Keurig,  utensils, there is coffee/ tea/ sugar. ) this is so thought out and kind. The private room and bathroom is very roomy with so much charm. The history of this charming home is such a pleasure to experience. I have many future plans to stay here. Liz is very accommodating in all forms. This gives me the perfect place to sleep in between school and my job and a safe place to park my car.

This is my second stay here. Perfect for my needs. Huge spacious room. The price is perfect, and better than a hotel.  Would recommend! has bed, couch, table, microwave, tea pot, mini fridge/freezer/ utensils,  Keurig, toaster oven. Just perfect.

I absolutely loved my stay here! Felt right at home and Elizabeth is a wonderful host. Everything was as described and the place is beautiful. If I’m ever back in Albany, I would definitely stay here again! Thank you Liz 😊
Elizabeth's place was 6 minutes from my work, as a commuter everyday I am so happy to have found this wonderful gem 💎 that I am certain I will utilize over and over again
A very confortable place, clean and beauty everywhere

Everything about my stay was extraordinary! Elizabeth was so kind and responsive, and while the studio looked great from the listing, it was even better in person. So much care was taken with every detail. The backyard and garden especially tickled me; I can't imagine a lovelier place to while away a summer evening. I hope I can make it back to Albany just to be able to stay here again.

The positives: the host was wonderfully responsive, the neighborhood was beautiful, and the bed was very comfortable, which matters a lot. But the room reminded me a little of Mrs Havershams dark and dusty house in Great Expectations.

3rd stay here. Its perfect for my needs between work/ school/ and clinical shifts. Huge room, comfy bed, a/c and fans. Nice mini kitchen-ish area. Mini fridge with freezer, toaster oven with drip coffee pot, electric tea pot, microwave, utensils, tea, coffee ground, creamer, sugar. Very thoughtful. Nice classic claw foot tub with halo shower. 1st floor🐝

Elizabeth's place provided a lovely stay in the Albany area! A short drive from the Capitol area which was perfect for my work trip. It's a very nice home, looks exactly as pictured. Parking is easy & it had everything I needed for a one-night stay.

Elizabeth’s place was very charming and had a wonderful atmospheric feel. She was very welcoming and her little notes around the room were appreciated. I really enjoyed sitting in the garden while having a morning cup of coffee. Will definitely stay here again.
Such a great stay ! So close to the colleges and all the different things in albany ! Liz is awesome, kind and caring :)
I really enjoyed my stay. The room was charming and had all the comforts of home. The pool and garden were beautiful. Thank you, Liz!
a nice quiet spot to stay. the bed was comfy.

Elizabeth’s place was great! A lot bigger than I thought, was pleasantly surprised to find out it was like a little studio apartment - instead of a room in her house. So all the furniture I saw in the pictures was in my room - that was great. Wish I got to spend more time there, but it was well worth the money. Thank you so much!
It was a lively room with all the amenities you could want. The bed was VERY comfortable. I wished I was staying more than one night. There is a lovely garden that I didn’t have time to enjoy.

Elizabeth’s place exceeded expectations. Everything was as described. The room was vey clean and charming with all hy amenities and details. Very comfortable . The back yard is like an oasis and perfect to relax and unwind.
I hope to return and would recommend Elizabeth’s place.

What an amazing hidden gem this place is!! The house is set back a bit in the trees and when I pulled my Mini in and saw Elizabeth's Mini, I knew we were off to a good start. Once inside the Red Room, I was greeted by the sweetest studio, with some notes from Elizabeth-- the most surprising was an invitation to her patio/garden area, grill, and in-ground pool!! I don't remember reading this in the registration page, so for future guests, bring your bathing suits!! The room was cozy and the bathroom had a beautiful clawfoot tub- complete with Epsom salts. The bed was SUPER comfy. The sun came out the next day and I took a tour of the back terrace, plants, pool, lawn. Beautiful. Did some yoga, poolside, soaked in the tub, and headed out by the noon check out. This place is perfect for concert goers (like me) needing a bit of R&R before heading back to real life. I'd love to be back!!
The space was exactly what I needed, in a nice and safe neighborhood, and a comfortable place to spend the night. Would stay here again!
Very comfortable studio apt in a beautiful neighborhood.    Very low traffic, walkable, nearby lake.  Host opens her gardens and pool and grill to guests.  Wonderful value, plan to return
My room was lovely and clean. The garden and pool were a wonderful surprise.

My 5th stay here with Liz. This place is absolutely perfect. For me this is a quiet, adorable place to come to that fits my needs. A bed, "mini" kitchen ( that has a mini /fridge freezer combo, microwave, toaster oven, drip coffee pot, tea pot, Keurig, utensils, there is coffee/ tea/ sugar.) this is so thought out and kind.
The private room and bathroom is very roomy with so much charm. The history of this charming home is such a pleasure to experience. I have many future plans to stay here. Liz is very accommodating in all forms.
This gives me the perfect place to sleep in between school and my job and a safe place to park my car.

This gives me the perfect place to sleep in between school and my job and a safe place to park my car.
Great stay!
We can never say enough about Elizabeth’s wonderful little place! It’s a perfect little home away from home for us. Thank you, Liz!
good Airbnb in a nice house

Just needed a place to stay for the night before flying out, so I didn’t spend much time in Albany, but this was a great spot for what I needed. Bed was super comfy, sheets mindblowingly soft. I went on a really beautiful evening walk as well, the neighborhood was very serene.
2nd time staying with Elizabeth and tonight will be my 3rd ☺️ I can't say anything negative,  I truly am grateful for the space and will stay whenever I can book!!! Her place is very comforting.
I'm a frequent flyer 💕 I sleep so good here, such an amazing place

Elizabeth's place was very clean, comfortable, and easy to access.  She has everything you need, and notes that answer all questions you might have.  It's a room within a shared building, with the bed against the common hallway- so you can hear when people are coming and going, but overall a very quiet and peaceful stay!
I just love Elizabeth's space

Elizabeth was wonderful! i was in town for a class for work so i was traveling alone and felt very at home here!! the ONLY thing was the guest staying across the hall was quite loud with both of the doors, but other than that it was everything i expected and more!
Excellent stay. Easy to find and in a great location!
Good value!

I have lost track of how many times j have stayed here im pretty sure im close to 10. I will continue to come here its perfect for my needs. Liz is a great host ! This place is absolutely perfect. For me this is a quiet, adorable place to come to that fits my needs. A bed, "mini" kitchen ( that has a mini /fridge freezer combo, microwave, toaster oven, drip coffee pot, tea pot, Keurig, utensils, there is coffee/ tea/ sugar.) this is so thought out and kind.
The private room and bathroom is very roomy with so much charm. The history of this charming home is such a pleasure to experience. I have many future plans to stay here. Liz is very accommodating in all forms.
This gives me the perfect place to sleep in between school and my job and a safe place to park my car.
I always enjoy my stay at Liz's place. My top choice for overnight stay in Albany.
Clean and comfortable place to stay. Would recommend
Liz's place was extremely comfortable and very close to where I'm going to school very peaceful great place if you need to study thank you for having me

This was a great place for an overnight! Super comfortable and homey. Had to remind myself to lock the door because it felt like staying with a friend or family member! Coffee pot was much appreciated and the claw foot tub was super cute. An amazing value, could probably charge much more.

While we didn't end up staying at this exact property due to some renovations wrapping up, our experience was very enjoyable! After assessing options with Peter, our group of 7 ended up staying at another Airbnb property through Peter which was gorgeous, newly renovated, and very spacious. Peter was very accessible, friendly, and willing to provide us with anything we needed.

A truly excellent experience with a host who was responsive and caring. Excellent and fast communication and he put forth effort to go beyond what was expected or required. The house is newly renovated and it feels like everything is brand new and well thought out.

The place was very clean and spacious.  It was perfect for our 7 guests and Piotr was very friendly and accommodating.  I would definitely recommend staying here as this location is convenient to all highways and the SUNY Albany Campus.  I would definitely stay here again!

Piotr is great.
He was extremely accomodating.
House is roomy
Kitchen is easy ro use and well supplied.
We will definitely be back

The Art Bungalow is exactly as it looks in photos- clean, simple, and being renovated. Piotr has done a lot of work on the house, from the floors to the new kitchen to new stairs.
He was very communicative and easy to work with. Thanks for the stay!

My friends and I needed a place to stay very quickly, and Piotr offered us this wonderful house. What a good surprise ! We didn't expect a place like this. The house is amazing, so beautiful, with everything that we need.... It was a great pleasure to spend the night in it, for sure we would have stayed much longer if we didn't have to go right away.
Moreover, Piotr was an excellent host. Very kind and helpful. Thank you !

Piotr is an excellent, efficient and welcoming host. He was prompt at arrival, even letting us in a few hours before his hosted check in time. This stay was for business, and he made my employees feel comfortable, private and well-taken care of. This is a beautiful property and the pictures and amenity lists are quite accurate. A wonderful host, and an excellent place to stay for business or pleasure in the the Capital Region.

Piotr was a great host. Met us at the house when he said he would and was super friendly. The house was not only clean, but very well maintained and manicured. We loved the plants! We were in Albany for a conference and it was nice to stay in this lovely house. Could use some furniture on the back deck, but otherwise it was a great stay. Thanks, Piotr!

Piotr was a wonderful host! He was readily available at all times and made us feel welcome as soon as we arrived.  Also the house was everything that we needed for our trip.  I would most definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay a weekend in the Albany area.

We had a lovely stay in Piotr's bungalow. He was extremely accommodating and flexible - communication was great.
The bungalow was even better than described and had everything we needed. It is a work in progress but very well done and very comfortable.
The location is excellent too - very convenient.
I can't recommend it highly enough - one of our best AirBnB experiences.

Great place! Piotr was very accommodating and the house is fantastic. Plenty of room, many, many amenities (the bottled water and snacks were a very nice touch), clean, updated. Oh, the bed in the "master" BR is heavenly! He's done a great job with this listing. I was especially appreciative of his willingness to accommodate us for only one night - especially when the house could also have held a larger group. It was great to be able to return to Albany, however briefly, and catch up with old friends in such comfort.
very helpful an responsive. wonderful house

El anfition fue perfecto. Muy amable y dispuesto a ayudar en lo que necesitaramos.
La casa perfecta, limpia y muy organizada. Mas de lo que esperabamos.
Super recomendado.

Piotr is wonderful, and so is his house. It was very comfortable to sleep in, and it really felt like he took great care of this place. He was very flexible with our off kilter schedule, which allowed for us to feel at ease for the time that we were there. I highly recommend staying at this Bungalow with a small or large group!

Peter was such a great host for my family. The house is very modern, cozy and very well kept. When my family & I come to Albany again, we would definitely book this place in a heartbeat. Thanks for the awesome hospitality Peter !
Peter is a very welcoming host. He has great attention to detail. The bungalow feels like home and is exceptionally clean. Great TVs!
Piotr was such a great host. The house was exactly as described and was very nice. Highly recommend.

My husband and I, and our two adult children loved staying here. The downstairs is spacious and comfortable. It had everything we needed and things we didn't expect - towel warmers and great tvs. The beds were super comfortable, with down comforters and lovely, soft sheets. The location is on a quiet street that makes it easy to access local highways. Best of all, the host is a wonderful communicator who always answered us quickly, graciously and thoughtfully. We highly recommend Piotr and this Airbnb!

This property is a treasure. Piotr has the place completely renovated, and he uses environmentally friendly , sustainable products. The bedding is high end, much like a luxury hotel. I would highly recommend Piotr's bnb, restful luxury at a reasonable price.
Wonderful place to stay! Great beds/bedding, beautiful/high end appliances, great deck, etc.

It was great place to stay especially when you are traveling in a big group. I got to meet Peter when checking-in to the house, and everything is prepared! I strongly recommend to stay here if you have the chance to visit Albany.

Piotr is awesome, and his house is fantastic. Everything has been recently remodeled and is super bright and clean. Piotr is so easy to communicate with and extremely flexible. Couldn't recommend staying here more, everything was perfect.

Piotr was a fantastic host, and we absolutely loved the Bungalow. Pictures don't even do it justice. The whole place is spotless and everything is brand new. Great appliances, smart TVs in every room, great deck and backyard, and the best part was the most comfortable beds. This was perfect for my entire family to relax and enjoy time with each other. Very convenient location as well. Highly recommend!

This was a *perfect* stay for several extended family members and myself when we gathered to visit other family in Albany. Lots of beds, extremely clean, and Piotr was flexible with an early check-in. Exactly what we needed!
We had a fantastic stay! The beds were super comfortable. The house had everything we could have asked for. We would definitely return.

Peter was an excellent Host. His home was VERY clean (cleaner than our own and we are picky people). Checking in and out was very convenient. It is a keyless entry so there were no keys to fuss with. Peter did not bother us, he left us alone unless we had questions or needed something. Peter not only provided the basics in the home, he went above and beyond even supplying the laundry products!
We will definitely stay there again when we go back home to visit family!
Awesome place great host! Great up to date technology and very comfy beds!
Great place with new appliances, lots of AC units, sound system, and terrific hosts. Really enjoyed hanging out on the porches with plenty of seating.
Easy to communicate with.  All details were well represented.  Refrigerator and range hood are really nice and the complete sonos system was a pleasant surprise.
房子靠近SUNY，上学非常方便，而且非常安静且安全。房子内的各项设施都十分完备，完全不需要客人操心。很感激Peter无微不至的照顾，我和我的朋友在Peter的这座房子里住了长达四个月的时间，在Albany的这四个月是我们非常珍贵的回忆。
Piotr was wonderful and made the stay really comfortable. I highly recommend staying here!

Piotr was very attentive, connecting by text to make sure all was going well for our stay.  Any questions were answered promptly.  The house was clean and comfortable.  Location is excellent with easy access to all around Albany and lots of convenient stores nearby.  Big TV in the living room with plenty of seating.  The kitchen is a fun 50's style with modern appliances.  It was a great base for our activities.

This is a lovely little house. It is homey and super comfortable. Over the years I have switched rooms or hotels because of dirty areas. Piotr’s house is very clean and tidy. The floors and stairs are beautifully shined. I thought the stairs would be slippery but they are not at all!
Appliances are new. Sonos sound system available for large screen TV. One block away from busy street with drugstore and restaurants. However the house is very quiet
Outside the back door there is a 2 story deck that is great for entertaining. We had a party of 10 and all fit there comfortably.
Loved this house and would definitely stay here again.

The house was extremely clean and the beds/pillows were incredibly comfortable! The host even provided us with a pack-n-play for our 16 month old son when we asked. We really appreciated that all of the light switches in the house were even labeled.
Great place

Piotr is a fantastic host and the property is perfect! Great location with ample parking and shops, university, and even church nearby. The house is extremely well-kept and clean, with top-of-the-line amenities. The beds were very comfortable. Everything you need is supplied, even a Sonos system and flat-screen TVs,  acoustic guitar, and poker chips available for those interested. Piotr responded very quickly to texts and requests. When we asked if there was a rice cooker before coming, we saw there was a new one supplied when we arrived. When we couldn't find two parts to a blender, he supplied us with a new, top-of-the-line Ninja blender. Other than an extremely comfortable in-doors area, the back deck and front porches are lovely. I highly recommend Piotr and this property, and will certainly plan on renting from him again when I need to be in Albany. Now I understand the definition of a super host. Thanks for an amazing stay, Piotr!

The Eden bungalow provides all the comforts of home and we really enjoyed our stay.  Located in a quiet neighborhood, it has a lovely porch, deck and yard to enjoy.  Piotr is a great host and has everything functioning beautifully so you can focus on your activities and spend minimal time figuring out how things work.  The house is clean and well-maintained.  Having multiple bathrooms and flexible sleeping arrangements worked well for our group.  So glad we chose this place and would definitely stay again.

We stayed at Peter's place for 4 months and everything was amazing. The place is lovely, the location is perfect to get to the bus station, cvs and UAlbany and Peter was a great host. Really felt like home. :)
PIOTR'S HOME IS A MUST STAY. GREAT LOCATION FOR A WINTER GET A WAY. SYMMER WILL BE A BLAST AS WELL. HE IS ALSO A GOOD HOST. AVAILABLE WHEN NEEDED.☺👍👍
very nice house！
We loved our stay here! Clean with updated appliances!
Fantastic house. Clean, comfortable, and plenty of space. Exactly as advertised. Highly recommend for a trip to Albany!
Great place, highly recommend!

It is in a convenient location on a nice side street, It is very spacious. The beds are so comfortable. The light switches are labeled which is very convenient. Lots of great amenities, even stuff like blenders, washer and dryer which is great. There’s TVs in each room and the sound system is great. The only thing it needs is blinds curtains on some of the windows.
We had a great day. The house is nice and well-appointed. It is also within walking distance to some restaurants and amenities. Overall a terrific location and a great host!
Great place. Lots of room for several. Clean. Centrally located. Parking and Peter was very hospitable.
Piotr is always an amazing host, this listing is truly great.
Good job all the way across the board!
Great kitchen space!
This Air BnB is very clean with a lot of amenities, especially in the kitchen.  I highly recommend.

It’s a clean, compact house close to the university campus, and generally as advertised, but just be advised to check the photos and “additional fees” carefully.
one of the 3 bedrooms doesn’t have a wall/door — it’s a space partitioned from the living room with a curtain, so it’s not super private and not at all sound proof.
it’s listed as 7 beds, but extra charges do kick in if there’s more than 4 guests.
Great stay at Piotr’s place. Clean, comfortable, convenient.

My family and I stayed at Piotr’s place for an extended weekend to celebrate my brother’s college graduation. The space was perfect for our BBQ. We found that Piotr had everything we needed when it came to cooking and being comfortable for the weekend. It is within walking distance to a 24 hour CVS, Rite Aid, restaurants, a bus stop to go downtown, and SUNY Albany. It felt like a home away from home. If we are ever in the area again, I will definitely stay here. Thank you!!

What a nice place for a family to stay. Do you need a place that has space and accessibility? This bungalow doesn’t disappoint! The renovations are well done and add charm and modernization to the home. It is situated in a residential neighborhood with multi generation and cultural feel. Walking distance to eats and quick cvs run. The place was clean and welcoming

This bungalow is a comfortable, well-equipped house in a quiet neighborhood, with the multiple bedrooms our family needed, and also the bonus of outdoor spaces for relaxing. Host Piotr quickly responded to our inquiry, and we appreciated his attentiveness.
Clean house, good location and big back yard with seating available. Wifi was good also!
As advertised. Clean and fully stocked kitchen.

Exactly as deacribed and more. Piotr's place was very convienient to SUNY Albany and was a perfect fit for our weekend needs. Top notch appliances, well organized  and easy to find supplies made this a lovely stay.
Beautiful and comfy space with many restaurants nearby.
N
Nice house!

The kitchen has everything you may need for cooking.  The  living room is very clean and nice.   But the windows in the room on the 2nd floor may not be good to protect the noise from outside if you are sensitive to noises, and there was no curtain in the window of the bathroom on the 2nd floor.  And I paid too much almost $600 for 2 days stay.  In overall, the house is good, but I felt the price was too expensive.
A lovely place to stay with a great open concept inside, comfortable front porch, and large deck on the back.

The home is very centrally located to downtown, airport and train station. Home was well stocked for hosting and spending outdoors time.  We were in town for The Arena Bowl and needed a home and that’s exactly what my family had.  HIGHLY recommend this as a place to stay.
Great place with cute backyard and comfy beds. Neighborhood was friendly and the bungalow was very welcoming.
Amazing place, loved the amenities. Would stay again and again

Piotr’s place was amazing for a group of us staying in town for a wedding. Everything surpassed our expectations and it was a fantastic space! The backyard was also incredibly peaceful and the beds were very comfy! I’d fall asleep as soon as my head hit the pillow every time. Everything was very clean and everything about this stay was exceptional! Thanks again for the amazing hospitality!
