This room is a room in an old home with a kitchenette and bathroom.
Great location, quiet, clean. The bed was a bit too soft for my back, but overall a great value. We would stay there again.

This was our second stay at Elizabeth’s little studio apartment. The accommodations were very comfortable. We loved the very thoughtful touch of a quart of fresh milk in the fridge to go with the supplied coffee and tea! Thank you for another cozy stay!

While my stay was very brief, it was absolutely perfect! I love staying in places that feel like a home-away-from-home, and not like a hotel room. This is one of those places! It is located in a beautiful neighborhood, with a nice little park across the street. Elizabeth was extremely friendly, and clearly does a great job with the upkeep of the property. I highly recommend this cute little place for anyone passing through Albany!
Perfect little spot to stay in Albany.

Beth made everything very easy from the moment I contacted her. A wonderful location too. I agree with the other comments that it was just what I needed and the right price for the accommodation! I recommend it.
A very comfortable stay and a great location not far from some great local places. Also very nice to have an easy way to enter and exit.

You’re not going to find a better stay for your buck than Elizabeth’s cozy, charming studio. Check-in was a breeze, perfect location, accurate listing, friendly+communicative host, and has all the amenities I needed for my trip.
wouldn't recommend she lies nd bothers you while intoxicated

It was a good location. It was as advertised. The host, Elizabeth was a good communicator and checked in online. It was a good value.
My wife and I would definitely stay there again.
Wonderful host.  Great space.  Lot's of charm and character.  Apartment very comfortable.  Unfortunately only able to stay for one night.  Nice to have the kitchen available if I were staying longer.
Elizabeth was friendly and the apartment was beautiful, not to mention there was a pool!
Super easy check in, cute and quiet neighborhood! I would definitely recommend to anyone staying in the area who is looking for a peaceful spot.
Lovely little place. Elizabeth was very friendly and helpful. I was just moving to Albany and Elizabeth accommodated by Uhaul truck and helped a bit with finding an apartment.

The photos really don't do it justice. The studio is so very charming. It has some backyard hangout space and even a pool to chill by that I don't think was mentioned in the post? The park is nice and quiet and basically like your front yard.  I came here for a writer's retreat from NYC by train. It was the perfect place for that purpose. There's a CVS 5 mins walk away. The kitchenette even has an air fryer. There were also fresh milk, bread, butter, and ice in the fridge for me to use when I arrived. I'd definitely come back.
Our stay was great. The studio was spacious and well decorated . No issues.

Highly functional use of space - the room was more spacious and functional than we expected, and we felt like kings staying there. Really great value. Liz kindly checked in with us and gave specific instructions - we had no questions. Excited to revisit!
Great stay
It was a very nice stay! A good neighborhood and venue

Really cute neighborhood near the hospital.  The room can feel a little cramped with things but it has everything you'll need which is the important part.  Some very ornate and nice decorations as well.  Would definitely recommend.
Cute and cozy apartment. Was able to work comfortably while there, no issues with WiFi and bed was super comfy! Would definitely recommend.
Clean & accommodating, definitely worth it.
Great apartment and a great price, wish I had brought a swimsuit to jump in the pool! Would definitely stay again.
Great stop for an early flight, cozy and quaint.
We enjoyed our stay here.  It was quiet, peaceful and very comfortable. Really nice place!

We really enjoyed our overnight stay at Elizabeth's place. The decor in the unit, the yard, and the neighborhood are great. We loved the antique look with the modern conveniences in the suite. We are bookmarking this place to check for availability next time we are in the Albany area!
Comfortable, quiet and relaxing.
Had a great stay in this quaint little studio.  It was perfect for an overnight stay with my husband.

This quest quarters in the old house on the park was great for my wife and me.  It is located in a quiet neighborhood with plenty of space to walk.  The yard and all the outside sitting spaces were great.  I was delighted to see the pool.

This was my place for a quick night coming through town. It was everything I needed and more. Great sitting places outside to sit and relax and drink a cup of coffee. The house is in a very quiet neighborhood. I would absolutely stay here again.

Pros: cheap price, in a goid neighborhood, has a pool, little kitchenette
Cons: in the heat of summer has no AC and no good fans, its fairly clean but kind of dingy, like cobwebs and stuff, if thats important to you, the bed is hard as a rock, the front door slams really loud so if yer not into loud noises then.....no hangers
the wallpaper is really dark so it can feel gloomy, its on street level so and has louvered blinds so people can still see in, so if you need privacy, quiet, bright atmosphere this is not yer place, if none of that bothers you and you just need a cheap place to crash this place is ok
Second time staying, beautiful place at a great value.
Super cozy and conveniently located!
Great place to stay if traveling in the area. My husband and I had a wedding in the area and instead of staying at a hotel we stayed here! It was perfect and has a very unique charm.

Gorgeous room, yard, and pool! Nice kitchen with everything you could possibly need and we even found english muffins in the fridge for breakfast !! Liz is lovely and an amazing host ! We felt very at home and were sad to leave. Great location as well !
Place is perfect little studio! Very clean, and cozy! The neighborhood is very nice as well and food in walking distance. Would definitely go back!

Great little place on a quiet street. Elizabeth was a great host going above and beyond to make sure my stay was inviting and enjoyable.
The extras were not expected but so appreciated…bagels, coffee, jam, and butter available to start my day.
The only suggestion would be to have the small window air conditioning unit repaired. It got really toasty in there.
Great experience. I’ll be back!

This is a wonderful place - amazingly decorated inside, but also the pool area (the inside brought outside for the summer. Bed was so comfortable it was hard to check out. Extra through put into extra touches. An easy stay! Highly recommend.

A spacious room with lots of character and everything you need to be comfortable. Check in was easy and Elizabeth was very responsive. I only stayed 1 night while visiting family in town but would happily stay again. Great value and location!

One of my go-to places in Albany. Everything in a compact studio: a kitchen with everything you need for a short stay, bathroom, desk/work spot, comfortable bed and plenty of space for relaxing outside.  Liz is very pleasant and a great communicator. Makes things easy!
If you appreciate old world charm and vintage surroundings, you’ll feel right at home here! Reasonably priced and much more, this is a great place to hang your hat while visiting the Capital Region!
Unbelievable value for a place that is clean, cute, and comfy. Check-in is easy, the room is super cool, and Liz is a communicative and kind host. Couldn’t have asked for more.
This is a lovely house in a quiet neighborhood around a small Park with a wonderful yard.
A very cozy apartment studio in a nice quiet neighborhood. Highly recommend for anyone visiting the town.

Great little studio in a very charming Victorian home.  The furnishings were beautiful and made the place very cozy. Liz is a very accommodating host - who  was lovely to talk to and very thoughtful.  The heat was not working properly so she made sure I had an electric blanket and turned on a space heater so that when I got home the place was very warm and comfortable.  I would highly recommend this place for anyone who needs a convenient and charming location to stay in while in Albany.  .
Really beautiful space!

ElIzabeth’s place is absolutely charming. While we ended up getting a slightly different room due to a scheduling issue, it was still perfect for what we needed and Elizabeth worked with and helped us the entire way to ensure that we were having a comfortable stay. She was a wonderful host and would definitely stay with her again!
This studio is beautiful, set in a quiet location, and the host is very nice
this place was classy
Great stay! Very comfortable and convenient!
This was a beautiful room that had everything we needed. Very happy with our stay here.

True to the pictures. Liz was quick to respond to a check-in inquiry.
The location is great and the few food items in the fridge were a nice gesture. Could have been a bit cleaner and I would have preferred the cleaning supplies had been put away but all in all a great value and a comfortable place. I’ll be returning.
Elizabeth's house was in a convenient, beautiful location and was clean and comfortable. Would reccomend!
Very comfortable studio and bed, convenient location near St Peter’s Hospital, restaurants, shops. Nice walkable neighborhood. Liz is a gracious host; this is one of my favorites in Albany.
Elizabeth's place is in a great location Ion a beautiful street, yet close to stores and restaurants.  The decor is a bit dark, with dark wallpaper, but it makes for a very cozy and relaxing room.
A charming Victorian studio. Nice quiet neighborhood too.

This is a charming stay. Liz is a great host. The studio has a wonderful feel to the decor, furnishings, and arrangement of living space, kitchen and bath. It is located on a sweet boulevard park with open space. The parking is close to the entrance.
The front door is a bit tricky, but once you get the hang of it, all is well.
my favorite stay in albany- she’s very accommodating and maintains the rooms so well!
Nice place and very cozy. It is in a very nice location.
Elizabeth’s place is a lovely, quaint studio  in a very quiet neighborhood. It is our go-to when we visit our family in Albany. Very comfortable bed. Thanks, Elizabeth!
Elizabeth was the perfect host!! She communicated quickly  and  was around if needed. The room was nice & beautifully decorated. The bed was sooo comfortable!!! Would definitely stay again!!
Liz's place was great. I recommend it.
This is my second time visiting this year. Love it. Will definitely stay again. Elizabeth is a great host.
A great place to stay! Elizabeth responded promptly and the place was just as described!
We had a great stay at Elizabeth's place.   Very comfortable and convenient.
Elizabeth’s house is so cute and historic, as well as the property. Parking was very easy and the location is very private, but close to everything in Albany! We would absolutely stay again.

Elizabeth's place is wonderful, as always. I have stayed here frequently, and will continue to rent from her every time I come to Albany. The space is as advertised, very comfortable, clean, and charming. Thank you, Liz!
such a wonderful stay with a great host!

We stayed at Liz's place for a quick overnight trip.  The space was great for our purposes and very convenient.  Liz gave great directions and communicated details about the place.  We will definitely consider staying here again!
gorgeous place, great location
Elizabeth has a lovely home. I really enjoyed my stay.

Nice, cozy and a reasonably priced place. The neighborhood was quiet and convenient. The cleanliness was very good but not perfect. Overall we are satisfied with our stay and I think this is a great place for short stays.
Elizabeth’s home is beautiful and cozy. I enjoyed my stay and would stay here again! Excellent location and easy check-in!

Elizabeth communicated very well. The directions and location were easy to navigate. The room smelled great. It has everything you could ask for. The space was perfect. I would definitely stay here again.
Lovely place! Bed is so comfy! Liz is easy to communicate with! Have stayed here a bunch of times!
Great stay and great location!
Sweet, sweet place in a lovely neighborhood; very comfortable and nicely appointed.
Elizabeth's place is in a great location, great value and all the communication was wonderful
Enjoyed the stay at this quiet retreat! Would recommend!!

I was staying in Albany for one night to attend a weekend of classes at College of St. Rose. I needed a place to stay for the night and Elizabeth's place popped up! For the price and what I needed, it worked out great! Elizabeth was great with communication! The decor was very unique and I like that! I would stay there again!
Very cozy and comfy place to stay and so cute!! Loved the space and location in Lake Placid, definitely considering a return visit someday.
Great place to stay that’s close to Albany. Everything is just as it appears in the listing.

I fully recommend this offering.  The place is so adorable, comfortable, and clean.  It has charm and Liz couldn't have been more gracious a host.  I appreciate all her efforts and hospitality.  I will definitely attend this studio again!
This was a perfect space and a comfortable stay in a nice location.

Elizabeth is a delightful person. I couldn’t reach her until the 2nd day and had some trouble with the hot plate, but once I reached her she attentively got things working . I would just advise you not to use both burners on the hot plate and make toast at the same time.
The neighborhood is wonderful. The street opens up into a broad courtyard that is peaceful with lots of old trees, birds, nice houses, and hardly any traffic. Dog walkers is about all I saw. It’s one block from New Scotland but completely quiet.
We had a very good time in Albany. Elizabeth's place is located in a lovely neighborhood and offers everything you need for you stay. I definitely recommend.

This was a beautiful spot, quiet and laden with bird activity. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a restful, comfortable spot within walking distance of Albany activity but away enough to find refuge. Elizabeth's communication was responsive and helpful.
So clean and very communicative, clear five stars
I had a lovey stay. I slept really well.

Elizabeth's place is great.  She was very accommodating to me as I booked on short notice.  Her communication was very good. The area that the house is in is very nice.  The room is perfect for one or two people.  It was clean and comfortable.  I would definitely stay here again.

Elizabeth is a wonderful host. She’s very communicative and respond quickly. Checking in was a breeze with the lockbox. The room is more like a private apartment. She has everything you need. This was my second time staying and it won’t be my last. ;)
Clean, neat and convenient to the Albany area
Elizabeth is a warm and welcoming host. It's easy to access her place which is close to main thoroughfares but in a quiet, peaceful n eighborhood.  Good way to get to know a nice part of Albany.
Liz’s home is perfect for a stay in the Albany area. A short drive away from everything. Liz was nice enough to install a window AC which was a big help for the unexpected 90+ temps in May.
Liz’s place is an exceptional place to stay as always!
she was very flexible with the check in and out times. it was a quiet house. veey comforting, accommodating, and well stocked with everything that you needed. the bed was comfortable as well.
The place is precious and in the most perfect location!!
Great place and location. Elizabeth accommodated me on the day of and couldn't be happier. Thank you~
Excellent stay! Really neat decor and everything we needed was there. Amazing price!

Super charming location and roomy enough for two for sure!
Highly recommend!
Liz’s place is everything I needed and more. She has a lovely home!
This stay was super nice in a good and quiet location! Check in was easy and the room was very clean and well decorated. Would definitely stay here again!
Such a wonderful stop in a great neighborhood. Instructions were simple and easy to find. 10/10 really. Actually booked it a second time.

Fully equipped studio apartment for a great price! In a peaceful neighborhood but close by all things in Albany. The place was comfortable for a week stay and good wifi and desk set up to work from home. A note for tall folks that the bed is a bit on the short side - I am 5’9 and found it to be just long enough.
The stay was absolutely beautiful! The house was clean, convenient, and the room was spacious and comfortable. The place is quite unique and Albany was a fun city to explore
Great location and place! Very quiet too.
Nice little apartment in a pretty, quiet location.

In the dark, it's a little bit hard to find, but Elizabeth's instructions will get you in if you follow them.  The home is lovely. The room had a lot of charm and was quite clean and comfortable.  I was traveling alone, but felt cozy and safe.  Took a walk around the park in the morning, where I saw Robin's and bunnies and squirrels foraging around.  It was June, so there was a lot of green. Very pretty. Quiet too.
Lovely studio. Check in was a breeze. Host was friendly and helpful. What more could you want?
Great room, comfortable bed. Perfect for my wife and I to overnight in.
Perfect quiet area for us to work while visiting Albany for the week. Would definitely recommend staying here!
The place is cozy and is in a safe neighborhood. Worked great for us (a young couple).
All we needed was a bed, & a bathroom.  This place did the trick.
like most other reviews, I will also use the word cozy. I enjoyed my stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again if in the area. The pool was a nice bonus as it was a really hot day when I stayed.

We enjoyed our stay! It is in a lovely neighborhood, the bed is very comfortable and Liz’ quick response time was much appreciated. We will definitely stay her again the next time we travel to/through Albany.
My travel plans changed at the last minute, but Elizabeth was very responsive to all of my communications.

This place is a rare jewel in a quiet, beautiful neighborhood. The efficiency apartment had everything needed, including a good shower & comfy bed. Outside yard and gardens have comfy chairs and benches. We would love to return!
Beautiful stay, simple and pretty!
Liz has a beautiful place, situated in a nice neighborhood. I highly recommend staying here.
Great location exactly as described!

Gorgeous furnishings and decor-- a vintage maximalist dream. The garden area is lush and peaceful. Host gave very clear check-in instructions; even though we arrived at night and were unfamiliar with the area we had no trouble finding the place or getting in.
Liz was kind to accept our last minute reservation during our road trip from Chicago to Boston.

Elizabeth nous a donné toutes les informations nécessaires dès le début. Tout était facile à comprendre ! L’endroit était propre, grande chambre fermer avec toilette privé lavabo de cuisine, frigidaire, et toute les commodités accessible; toaster, petit four electrique, gaufrier, et plusieurs autre, le lit confortable. Nous avons très bien dormi ! Nous avons eu droit à des lucky charm pour déjeuner et du lait sans lactose qui étais dans le frigidaire. Merci encore une fois pour cette belle attention ! Étant intolérant j’étais au ange ! Merci encore n’hésitez surtout pas !
Great location. Pool area is beautiful! Definitely worth more than the price !
Liz's place was in a very convenient and pretty location. We loved the decor!
N/A
Nice room at a quiet location. Clear communication.
Beutiful place in a very nice and quiet area. Room was tidy and clean and we felt cozy and at home.

Liz’s place is very sweet and cozy. Its old and eclectic, but that’s part of the charm. For the price it’s a great value. It’s in a lovely setting on a small park in a very nice neighborhood. Everything needed for a short or long stay is included … even use of an unground pool. It’s a great use of space with all the essentials to cook your own meals. The bed is super comfy. There is a great TV (with a Netflix account). Liz’s communication was always prompt and helpful.
What a charming place with something to see and appreciate everywhere you look!  Liz is a very gracious host, and we are already looking forward to our next stay.
This spot was perfect, very clean and comfortable. Appreciated the small details in the space. Highly recommend
The apartment is cozy and cute in a beautiful part of town. The area seems very safe and it was perfect place to stay after a long day!
Fantastic older home in a cozy neighborhood. Wish I had spent more time the next morning in the room and explored the area more. Highly recommended!

Really appreciated this cozy space after a long day of driving on a Canada road trip. It has everything you’d need, is on a nice, quiet street, has easy check in, and is a nice change from the somewhat personality-less/bland decor of many airbnbs out there. I’d book again next time I’m in Albany!
This place is even better than the pictures! Adorable, great place to stay while in Albany, close to the city center.
Lovely quiet place on a quiet street.  It is tucked away so need to drive for anything but felt very safe.
Really worth the price, has everything you need. Peaceful area and comfy bed mimimimimimi

Very comfortable efficiency in a great quiet neighborhood close to CVS and Hospital, and 10-min drive from UAlbany.
Plenty of amenities as listed, with easy check in/out. I would absolutely stay here again!
great place to stay, thank you

Quiet nice neighborhood. easy walk to St. peters hospital. easy check in and great communication.
Everything available to cook, so you are spending money eating out every day. hot water and good water pressure.
gorgeous room. very comfortable and lots of accommodations
Adorable Victorian studio with very comfy bed. Safe and quaint old neighborhood. Our stay was great except it was quite chilly and we couldn’t get the heat to come on. Appreciated the coffee machine!
What a charming apt, with a great location. Elizabeth is a great communicator and host!
This was the third time I stayed at Elizabeth's home.  It's easy to get to from main roads, in a pleasant neighborhood, and has the most comfortable bed in the world!
Great stay!
We always enjoy staying at Elizabeth’s sweet little place!

I'll preface that my fiancee was not thrilled about staying at an old house. She also found the studio a bit cluttered for her taste. I found the unit interesting if eclectic. Beware the house is somewhat difficult to identify in the nighttime for check in (no house number visible from the street). The main door key needs jiggling to open. The unit is located near a quiet park. The studio is one of the units in the house, close to the main entrance. The sounds of other occupants coming and going are heard pretty clearly from the studio. Although the neighborhood is quiet, one neighbor warmed up his car for over 10 minutes causing noticeable idling sounds that woke me up on the morning. The coffee, tea and fixings were a nice touch.
Great place to stay, clean, nice location, kitchenette

This Airbnb is a gem! It's cozy and furnished with love to details. Located in a beautiful wooden house in a typical American neighborhood it offers all you need for a comfy stay while being affordable! (Plus a beautiful wooden floor that not only European hipsters will love.) Though we didn't have the opportunity to meet Elizabeth in person, communication was easy-going and replies were fast, including detailed instructions for an effortless check-in. Can recommend it in any case and would love to come back someday.
This accommodation might work best for those with a (rental) car or those who rely on shuttle services like Lyft or Uber or bring/share a bike. Similar to other cities in the US of that size public transit is not fully developed and the Airbnb might be not accessible very well in off-peak time—though getting around by bus in Albany is definitely possible.
This is a cute and unique studio to stay in. I just stayed the night on my way further west. Lots of cute extras and plenty of towels.
Very nice little place, comfortable bed, convenient for exploring.

Cutest little vintage style place. I mean little literally, but it was so cozy and clean. Wifi was perfect, parking was easily accessed and the basic kitchen supplies provided. Super happy to have found this place and would 100% recommend.
Very comfortable, charming place. So unique! We are repeat visitors, always looking forward to the next stay.
Perfect for my parents’ visit to Albany for Thanksgiving. Great location in a nice neighborhood. Charming studio with great details. Had everything my folks needed including a very comfortable bed.
A wonderful stay and a wonderful person!

A very comfortable and cozy room in a larger house. It’s equivalent to a large hotel room in size but much homier and has a kitchenette area with amenities and a full size fridge etc. The entry to the house and access to the room is easy and private as well. Elizabeth was a responsive host and provided clear and prompt instructions about arrival.
The furnishings are all very comfortable and the space has lots of character (in the best possible sense). Definitely recommend this rental for 1 person or a couple spending a day or two in Albany.

This was the perfect room for I what i needed. I live 7 hours away from family and I didn't want to waste a visit day traveling around the holidays. it's a big room with a full bath attached. there was also a kitchenette area, a TV, a desk, a small couch, a chair, and a huge bed. it was perfect for my partner and me and the bed was very comfortable. it was walking distance from a couple of bars and we walked to one for dinner.
The room was clean and ready for us when we arrived and I personally enjoyed the later check out time.
Super cute and quiet location!! Loved staying here!
Great apartment - loved the décor and all the amenities available!

This was a lovely place filled with everything we needed. Elizabeth stocked the fridge with milk and butter, and the kitchen was stocked with spices which made cooking a quick meal easy. Check-in was very straightforward, the bed soft and comfortable, and quiet neighborhood.
We booked last minute.  Host was quick to respond, helpful, and friendly.  The place was clean, quaint, and a good value.
Amazing place, great host, wonderful time every time I sleep here! Will be back soon!
Very antique and lovely studio, the kitchenette was well equipped, and the location felt nice and safe. It was convient for where I needed to go and the host was understanding of my late check in.
Great studio apartment, and a great stay. Every time I stay here, it’s better than the last time. Highly recommended.
My husband was in the hospital nearby so this place was perfect for me.  Perfect for 1 person or a couple.
Quick and easy for an overnight stay, Elizabeth was clear with instructions to check in and some very nice personal touches to the studio. Definitely recommend

I had stayed at this place for a number of days because it was close to the hospital where my husband had been a patient, making it very convenient.  I could only book a couple of days at a time and in advance, because we were unsure how long my husband would be hospitalized.   Into the 2nd week of my on and off stay, both my husband and I contracted Covid while at the hospital.  When I contacted the owner the day before my stay and advised her that I had tested Covid positive, I requested a refund for the 2 days .  She advised me that she had a policy of requiring a week before for cancellation, which would have been impossible for me as I was only booking a couple of days in advance of my stay.  She would not refund any of my money.  I wonder if she would have preferred that I keep my reservation?  My suggestion for anyone considering renting from her would be "Buyer Beware" that should extenuating or unforeseen circumstances occur, you would be out your money like I was.

I had been staying at this place on and off for over a week while my husband is in St. Peter's Hospital.  His medical circumstances necessitated me booking the room for 2 days at a time because we did not know how long he was going to be there.  This week I had the room booked for Wednesday and Thursday and found out on Tuesday we both tested positive for Covid.  I contacted the homeowner to let her know I wouldn't be staying and I had to go home to quarantine.  I requested a refund for obvious reasons.  She informed me that her policy was for a one week cancellation request for a refund.  My suggestion for future renters is Buyer Beware.  If you have any type of emergency right before your stay you will be out any money that you paid.
Located in a beautiful neighborhood within walking distance or a short drive to all of Albany.
I loved this place, like a beautiful Victorian room, exceptionally clean, cosy and comfortable. I only wish I had more time to stay and relax!

Elizabeth’s place was perfect for a quick overnight stop on my route home. Check in was easy and the studio was clean and comfortable. I really appreciated the disposable coffee cups provided so I could take a coffee with me for the start of my drive after my stay.
Great location, beautiful part of Albany. Liz was very responsive, very high speed internet, decent sized parking space
Nice neighborhood, good space for the price. Proximity to many locations is good
Cute, quaint spot for a quick stay. WiFi was great. Well appointed.

Elizabeth’s place was very cozy and made me feel at home! She gave clear and precise directions to find the house and how to obtain the key and enter the house! Definitely recommend staying here when in the Albany area!

The studio is a piece of art! I love how Liz paid attention to the tiniest details!
The place is very clean, close do the city center, it has everything that you might need.
The only bad thing is that I had to leave! One of my absolute best Air bnbs.
Thank you, Liz :)
Nice, quiet, and peaceful. Would stay again.
I have stayed with Liz multiple times and it is always been comfortable and convenient.

We had a quick stopover in Albany and this was the perfect place. Great parking, easy to access late at night, and beautiful on the insides with lots of amenities to make it easy to feel comfortable when we had to get up and go. The room was beautiful too! Thank you!
Super easy to find, great neighborhood, and the perfect stop over place as I was headed to the Berkshire's.
This was the perfect little spot!  The description of the space was accurate.  It was cozy, quaint, and private.

I had one issue after another with the space after check in. Firstly I had a question on how to get the tv to work. I did all this through the secure AirBnB messaging. Then I noticed that the room and bathroom were dirty. By morning the heat wasn’t working and the room was at 60 degrees. Many messages later she still hadn’t gotten back to me. It took her 14 hours to respond. Most things can be rectified, but not keeping good communication, especially when you have multiple AirBnB rentals is not excusable.
In the end I had to book a Marriott for my last 2 nights, but she did reimburse me for that expense.
Elizabeth's apartment was perfect for our visit. The bed was extremely comfortable and the apartment had everything we needed. The neighborhood is also very nice!
it was very comfortable... very safe neighborhood!! Ready to communicate easily!! no problems at all ... peaceful, quiet, would stay again!!!
it was perfect... very safe neighborhood!! home was beautiful.. host was very friendly and helpful. would definitely stay again!!!
This space is beautiful and has everything you need and more!
Very pleasant and nicely decorated spot to stay for the night.
Pleasant stay, bed very comfortable
A cozy place to stay.
The place was really clean and in a good neighborhood. The Victorian feel of this place really added to the experience.Really clean.I recommend

Such a nice lady in an idyllic space
Looking forward for my next visist

The apartment is on the ground floor of an old house in a peaceful neighborhood. The house is old but has character and the apartment was comfortable. comfortable bed, seating area, desk, small kitchen, and bathroom. It was very warm during the days the spring weekend we were there. there was no air conditioner installed yet but the apartment stayed cool and we could open a window at night. There are clusters of restaurants and bars within a 5 minute drive, and the location is about halfway between downtown and university of Albany.
A beautiful comfy place to stay, walking distance from St. Peters. I will definitely try to come back. Liz was great and a friendly host.
Elizabeth had prompt and clear responses. The neighborhood was quiet and the stay was comfortable - definitely preferable to a motel or similar for my quick stay!

A nice little place for our needs! The room was cozy and had lots of character, with great amenities for most needs. Parking was easy. The place did however have quite a fiddly lock, and when we experienced problems with our shower, we did not hear from the host on our inquiry neither during or after our stay. There were a couple cobwebs in the bathroom and the food in the fridge had gone bad a month ago. That being said, it did fill our needs for a quick stop over, with a comfy bed, a place to make our tea and all around a safe ans cozy neighbourhood for a super fair price 😄

Beautiful, charming little apartment in a great location if you’re in the area for a concert, or just to explore Albany! We were visiting to see Noah Kahan at The Palace Theatre, and it was a perfect spot to spend the night. Super easy to get downtown from there. Bonus: mattress is very comfortable!
Only issue with the stay was that the apartment was quite dusty, and there were scattered bits of trash in corners of the apartment/on shelves (i.e. a couple of shriveled blueberries, open tea bags strewn about shelves, random wrappers). However, still leaving 5 stars because the place was really affordable for what it is, and the important areas you need clean were fine. It is an old house, so dust is somewhat inevitable, but it could’ve been a bit cleaner for sure. Would absolutely still recommend it!
Nice place to stay in a quiet and relaxing neighborhood, highly recommended!
I was only in town for a quick overnight, but the space was lovely and I was sorry I didn’t have more time to linger.  Bed was very comfortable.
another great stay at Elizabeth's place! it was glad to stay here again.
The place was exactly as described. It was perfect for our weekend away in Albany. Would stay here again if ever in the area.
Very nice and cozy. Definitely worth the visit and would stay again.
It's all good. We hope to stay with Elizabeth again in the future. Thank you.
Nice private, quiet room with kitchen and bathroom!
We had a great stay at Elizabeth’s house. So many amazing things to do around the area!

Her studio is super cute with an amazing backyard. It was perfect for what we needed. She has taken a small space and used it very wisely to creatively put in place everything that you need. It's a great quiet neighborhood. We would definitely stay here again.

We had a fine time. Be sure to ask questions- with typos in parking instructions, we found it difficult to find the right spot. Also, be warned that while you have the studio, you are still very much in a shared house with other apartments (we struggled with the the doors and getting our bags in when arriving and the next afternoon we were encouraged to be more careful about the doors slamming in a note left on the door). This is a shared space, know that the other folks in the building are paying attention to you!
We loved Liz's place! The bed is SO comfortable, and the space is simply beautiful. I'd live here if I could. Thank you, Liz!
Easy check in and out, perfect for what we needed. Fantastic value.
We loved this little studio, it was cozy and beautiful. Thank you for having us!
awesome hostess and a amazing place to stay. the studio is decorated beautifully
Perfect little spot. Beautiful garden too!
Great stay, perfect for the night I needed to crash.

L'hôte n'a pas répondu à notre courriel (pas de savon dans la douche, manque d'une taie d'oreiller, pas de mouchoir). Elle a seulement communiqué avec nous avant l'arrivé et lors de notre départ (par courriel).
L'aménagement est bien. Les photos sont représentatives.
La localisation est parfaite. Très beau quartier sécuritaire et tranquille. La propreté n'est pas top (poussière, micro onde sale, bouilloire sale et vielle eau) mais le reste est OK.
Le lit est très confortable. On aurait aimé plus que deux oreillers mais bon , on en a trouvé une autre dans le rangement (sans taie).
Elle devrait changer les serviettes de bain (grands trous).
Beaucoup de postes de télé, bon ventilateur de plafond, air climatisé fonctionne bien. On ne retournerait pas mais c'était correct pour le prix.
Was passing through town and stayed for a night. The area is very cute and the house was perfect for my needs.
A nice quiet little place to spend the night. Had some issues with the doors, but the space was cozy, had everything you could need at a great price. Would stay again!
Beautiful space if you’re ever in Albany. Highly recommend :)

My wife and I spent one night at Lizas on our trip to Rhode Island. We very much enjoyed our stay. The studio was exactly what was described and the pool was extra relaxation and enjoyment. What stood out to us was the restful quietude of the neighborhood, I actually slept in.

Logement calme et charmant, tel que sur les photos !
Pas grand chose à dire de plus, hôte très réactive et disponible :)
Nice little studio, has everything you need

Liz's place is perfect for anyone needing a quiet place to study, sleep, or get away for the week/end.  It is conveniently located just minutes from area hospitals, restaurants, and breweries.  Liz keeps her rooms clean, clutter-free, and comfortable.  I would absolutely recommended Liz's Place.
This is a good studio room for the price. It has a bit of an old house smell but a comfortable bed and good place to sleep for the night.
Everything was as described.  Cozy little place in a nice neighborhood. Easy transaction!
Great stay, quiet neighbourhood
Cozy and safe stay
I enjoyed my stay! Would stay again.
awesome place
Camera carina e silenzionsa , un po’ meno apertura della porta . Tutto sommato esperienza positiva
Very grateful for such a simple, straightforward booking, communication, check in, check out process. Lovely spot to stay.
Cozy and affordable place to stay. Very peaceful and beautiful. Liz was flexible with a late check in and was very communicative.

Liz’s place is comfortable and adorable. I love the antique Victorian styling. The kitchenette is very useful, I don’t like to eat out every meal while on the road. Repeat guest in both suites and I’ll be booking again the next time I’m in Albany!
Great comfortable space in a quiet neighborhood.  I wish we could have stayed longer.

Elizabeth was a great host, communicative, and friendly.  The place was spacious and relaxing.  It could have been a bit cleaner overall but it had everything I needed and I was super comfortable and happy with the experience of staying there!
Beautiful accommodation in a  lovely neighborhood. Highly recommend
Stay here!!! We needed a quiet, private rest stop between Ontario Canada and Rhode Island. Liz's studio is PERFECTION!

We really liked Elizabeth’s place. It was a small studio space but everything we needed was there. There was a little kitchenette area with a hot play, cookware, a sink, a toaster oven, and a full sized fridge. The bathroom was stocked and the bed had plenty of blankets and pillows. Nice and clean. We loved the windows looking out into the garden.

If I could give 6 stars I definitely would! This house is by far the most beautiful and authentic place I have ever stayed at! If you want to get an impression of how these beautiful country old houses look like from the inside, this stay is all what you need. As a history lover, it was just wonderful as the decoration has been really kept in its original style. The studio was equipped with everything. A nice tv and a beautiful bed, practical kitchen and nice bathroom. An old fashioned desk with some nice info on Albany and a cozy sitting area. The place is in a very quiet and green neighborhood and it’s close from the city center. A great starting point to discover Albany. I would truly recommend this hidden gem if you want to have a unique experience.
Needs some maintenance and a good thorough deep cleaning

We had a lovely stay in the Blue Suite.  It was the perfect amount of space for the 2 of us and we were thankful for the AC and fan during a heatwave! The bed was a soft place to land at the end of our busy days.
A nice place to stay in the Albany area.
Awsome!
The area was very peaceful and the room itself is cozy and relaxing. One of the most comfortable beds I’ve slept in well worth the price.

The area was so quiet and peaceful. It’s located in a great spot in Albany. It’s really close to the NYS museum which was great to visit, as well as some nice restaurants downtown. The outside patio is really well maintained and beautiful. Checking in/out was extremely easy and the studio is clean. Overall it was really nice and I’ll hopefully be visiting again.
Wonderful time staying here. We came in late, and was able to sleep in because of the noon check out. This was our second time here and things were consistent with the first stay. We will stay again!
It is always a pleasure to stay at Liz’s place! It’s clean, comfortable, and a beautiful home. Thanks Liz!
Elizabeth's Blue Studio is a nice cozy alternative to the traditional hotel. Homey touches and charming grounds (including a pool) really make for a peaceful getaway in beautiful Albany
Such a charming place, would definitely come back and suggest it to friends.
Nice place for $80!
This place worked well for us to stay overnight before leaving early this following morning.

This studio is located on the first floor of a charming old home. The front porch is outfitted with inviting wicker furniture for relaxing in and from which you can take in the extensive gardens. The location is very central - near small shops, dining options, a college & hospital.
The neighborhood is very walkable and quiet and the bed was very comfortable. I met Elizabeth as I was leaving and she was very friendly, which was consistent with her messages to me before our one-night stay.
With a deep cleaning, this would have been a 5-star experience!

Lovely stay-we had to find the house at night which was slightly challenging but everything was exactly as described. Very clean and tidy. Kitchenette and bathroom well stocked. Would stay again if needed :)
Great stay!

Very convenient location and peaceful surroundings.
The spot was ok. Needs some more maintenance though.

Our short time in the apartment was very good. Although some things seemed a bit dated or in need of an upgrade, it still had everything we needed and then some. We never got to meet Liz, but her instructions to get in were easy enough.

TERRIBLE!!!!
Elizabeth has bad communication and is miserable. My girlfriend and I stayed here last weekend and she was very welcoming at the door after popping out of nowhere acting as if we were trying to interfere with her property not realizing that we were the guests. Not only that, at 9:30pm she makes a report to air bnb falsely accused us of breaking house rules intending to kick us out in the middle of the night. She tried to charge me $400 as damage to her tv knowing that it was already discolored and leaking ink. She claimed that we smashed her tv but little does she know we have proof of the state the tv was in when we arrived. The place was clean but had a musty and dusty odor to it. DON’T COME HERE!!!!

I was so glad to be able to stay with Liz one last time before my travel contract ended. Walkable distance from St. Peters, and a CVS and other restaurants nearby. It was very easy to check in and the place was so beautiful and clean. Liz was responsive to my texts. Loved it!
Great stay in a really nice neighborhood. I'd like to stay at Liz's place again!

We loved our stay at Liz's airbnb in Albany. Great location (just slightly away from downtown in a quiet residential area; but within 5 mins drive, you will be in the middle of the city). The unit is very charming and as exactly as described. Liz is super helpful when we needed to reach out. We would love to come back the next time we are in this part of upstate NY.
Great place to be

Elizabeth’s place is a charming, nostalgic studio in a private nook of a green suburban neighborhood. Everything was just as described, and we are thankful for our relaxing overnight stay on our way to Vermont from Pennsylvania. It was not difficult to locate -easy on and off the highway.
nice place
Lovely ground floor suite with kitchen facilities in the room. Off street parking in a quiet neighborhood. Good value,  happy to highly recommend.
Great will book again, peaceful and quiet

She was very nice I had a long drive and also worked a 16 hour shift and she was very accommodating she let me check in early and check out late which I definitely appreciated and I will definitely stay again.
Thank you Elizabeth!
The place was perfect. Beautiful place and very clean and pleasant.
We enjoyed our anniversary. Cute place with a city with so much to offer.
it was nice
I stayed here for one night and it was really cozy. Would recommend!
Super comfy bed.

Had an amazing time
Highly recommended

We were visiting our daughter in the area for Christmas and needed a place to spend the evening. The place was absolutely beautiful. The area was quiet and the surrounding area was peaceful and calm. The space was even more attractive than advertised. The entire space was in pristine condition. We would highly recommend the studio and the area!
Lovely studio apartment on a beautiful park, super convenient location and look forward to staying there again.
Very comfortable and cozy , I would definitely start again.
Super cozy

Elizabeth is friendly. We had the chance to meet her and share a few words before we checked-out. She was easy to communicate with and quick to respond. She kept us informed about the local weather before we arrived (they were expecting a snow storm) which was very helpful!
The place is quaint, very confortable and private. Very cozy bed might I add!
I truly recommend!!
Great place. Good location, will stay again.
Very comfortable, cozy, quiet, and peaceful place to stay. Couldn't even tell it was in the middle of a city. Parking and check-in was a breeze.  Highly recommend!

Was traveling for work upstate - coming from NYC. Not only was Liz’s place WELL worth there price, check-in was secure and easy, and her studio is adorable. Will definitely stay here again for my upstate travels.
Perfect for our overnight and back on the road stay.

Place was wonderful
Just as expected
What a lovely room! I love how it made me feel like I took a step back in time. Will definitely request a rebook!

I mostly booked this place because it was a good price in Albany and looked much more charming than the local hotels. Yet it not only was very comfortable but also exceeded my expectations.
Elizabeth was very friendly and responsive as a host, the bedroom was both very charmingly decorated as well as being comfortable and good quality, and the neighborhood was quite nice and walkable. I would definitely recommend.
We had a quick stay along our journey, and it was the perfect spot for an overnight with my son. Easy parking, quiet, private, and very affordable.

We had a lovely one night stay. The room was very nicely decorated, the kitchen was well equipped, and the location was great for our needs. It was a great value, too! We would definitely stay here again.
Great place! Very comfortable and cozy! Highly recommend! Thank you for the great stay!
Such a cute spot
Elizabeth's place is really cute and comfortable, nice quiet neighborhood.
I enjoyed my stay. Liz is pretty responsive as well!
Liz's place was beautiful and cozy in a quiet, peaceful neighborhood.  It was a great stay!
Very nice room with private bathroom and little kitchenette. Thank you for letting us stay with you

In the era of soul-less corporate AirBNB's, Liz's place is a breath of fresh air. The decor is charming, the bed comfortable, and the amenities well thought out. Great value and a great place to rest our heads for the night. Would definitely recommend to others.
we had a lovely stay, thank you
Wonderful studio, great host, would stay again.
Elizabeth's place is in a great location near several restaurants, and very comfortable.

Elizabeth’s blue studio was quite comfortable and she was so thoughtful in all that she provided for us during our stay. The bathroom was a little dirty which was the only thing we didn’t like, otherwise everything else was great! The room was quite unique with high ceilings and a Victorian feel. The bed was very comfortable and we appreciated having a mini kitchen included.
Hôte très sympathique
Great space and location. Perfect for short visits to Albany.
Short comfortable, stay, highly recommend.
Elizabeth's place is cozy and clean and a great value for a quick trip.

We found this to be a quaint and lovely spot to stay while visiting family.  We didn't get a chance to interact with Elizabeth personally, but she provided very detailed information and all was as she described. I would definitely stay here again.
Elizabeth's listing is perfect for a budget conscious traveler looking for a quiet, clean place to stay in their travels. This was exactly what I needed, and wouldn't hesitate to book again.

This place was even more beautiful in person! Check in and check out was very easy, and everything went very well during our stay. We only stayed one night but I would definitely come back if I was staying in Albany for longer!
Great, and cozy place. Highly recommend
Great stay!
Great spot to stay in Albany! Close to everything. Love the decor!
So beautiful! super well decorated in a super safe neighborhood. Loved it!
A charming studio apartment in a quite little park
Great place to stay
This is a lovely home, decorated with great taste, and very comfortable for a couple.  Very well worth the price.
A really beautiful and comfortable stay!
Great neighborhood for walking and easy check in. I’d stay here again happily!
Really appreciated the chance to stay at Elizabeth’s, it was a perfect place. Comfortable, easy checkin, kind and communicative host. Also a great historic area. Would recommend to anyone!
Great host, good value for money, and space as advertised. The bed was really comfortable, and we slept well bar the super noisy fridge every time it kicked in.
I recommend Liz’s adorable apartment. I definitely would stay here again.

Liz is a responsive and attentive host. We are so happy we were able to book this air bnb because it was exactly what we needed. We enjoyed the overall design of the studio along with the spacious feel. When coming back to Albany I hope this air bnb is available again because it was perfect! It was also close to a lot of services and places to visit.

Very Nice short stay for the area. Just 1 thing was bathroom had a long lingering smell and there wasn’t a garbage bag.
Very good communication and peaceful area. Thanks
Great stay in a quiet neighborhood, visited here for a work trip and felt right at home. Good for couples and it's comfortable and warm, 10-15min from downtown! Will visit again!

This spot was in such a lovely calm area with tons of open grass and clean streets.
The space itself was so fun and quirky in its decorations—really enjoyed ourselves!
Beautiful area and perfect for my husband and I for a night in Albany. Slept very well and felt extremely comfortable there.
Very affordable option in a nice area, but could use some updating and some deep cleaning.
The place was cute and comfortable!

casa molto carina e tenuta con molta cura. l'appartamento dedicato a noi era molto grande e spazioso. non abbiamo trovato aspetti negativi.
non avevamo internet durante il ns viaggio quindi abbiamo apprezzato molto che Elizabeth ci abbia dato con largo anticipo tutte le informazioni necessarie per arrivare a casa sua.
Great location!
Very cute, clean space that was perfect for a quick overnight stay. Very nice neighborhood, felt safe, and loved that there was parking.
Nice place to stay, very friendly  host, would recommend

De deur klemde heel erg van de studio, waardoor je hem slecht open kreeg of op slot kreeg.
De banken en stoelen waren zeer oncomfortabel. De indeling was anders dan op de foto's. Studio is aan renovatie toe.
Als de eettafel een kwart slag gedraaid en er 2 stoelen aangeschoven worden, kun je er samen eten. Nu zaten we om de beurt aan tafel en naar de muur te staren.
op de tafel lag de beschrijving om uit te checken;. Doe deuren op slot en leg sleutel on brievenbus of sleutelkluis.
Toen we weggingen om 10.30 u was Elizabeth niet thuis. Dus netjes alles afgesloten en sleutel in kluisje. Onderweg kreeg ik een telefoontje van Elizabeth, wat ik niet kon beantwoorden. Daarna bericht of we uit de kamer waren.
Geen internet onderweg. Dus 's avonds een bericht gestuurd dat we ruim op rijd uitgecheckt hadden. Maar dat had ze ook kunnen zien aan de sleutel in het kluisje.
Really nice spacious and well decorated room.

I have stayed at this airbnb once before last fall. This is by far my favorite air bnb in
the Albany area. Beside the bed, there is a couch and small
table, TV, kitchenette, snacks and coffee. The bed is very comfortable. We walked to a Dunkin' Donuts and wonderful restaurant (605) on New Scotland Avenue. If this accommodation is available when I come to Albany, this is where I will stay.
I would totally stay again, only longer next time.

Elizabeth was friendly. The place was in a cute, older home and that carried through to the studio space. Since it was in an older home the bathroom was dated and probably in need of an update as the shower was grimy. The room did not have AC so a box fan was placed in an open window allowing bugs to get in which I found throughout the studio. I was able to close the window and kept the multiple fans going through the night to keep me cool. It was a good space for a quick one night stay for the price.
Loved Liz’s place. Very quaint. Exactly as described.  Will stay there again!
Fun, unique home on a quiet park and Liz is a wonderful host.

Overall nice studio apartment.  I just needed a place to sleep and this was exactly what I needed.  The decor made it feel like it was some old Victorian place.  I appreciated the furniture -- small table and chairs for eating, couch and armchair alongside a coffee table.
Enjoyed staying here! Quiet place and felt right at home. We got in incredibly late due to flights and she accommodated this for us! Would recommend anytime!
It’s was perfect for my one night stay! The beautiful neighborhood was quiet and the place itself was cozy and comfortable.
We had to cancel due to one of us being sick but Elizabeth was great responding to my email(s).   I know that area and her place is at a great spot. Will def try to book again.

My husband and I needed a quick one night stay passing through to get some sleep.
Very happy with our stay! I felt so safe and peaceful here. Would highly recommend
easy pit stop in Albany. House is pretty and we liked the old victorian style.
Got there late so we could not meet our hostess. But very pleasant messages were left by Elysabeth to encourage us to use the pool and enjoy the garden, which we did and it was lovely.
Liz was very easy to reach, gave clear check in instructions and the room was very quaint and clean. The bed was also very comfortable!  We enjoyed our stay at this Air BNB.
Bon séjour en albany, quartier safe, malheureusement sa sentait très fort la peinture fraîche. C’était désagréable à long terme. Mais bon sa passe pour une nuit. Merci Elizabeth

Liz's Victorian property is located on a quiet street in an upscale neighborhood, conveniently located about midpoint between the university and downtown. The property has all the amenities, and is surrounded by beautiful gardens, a gazebo, and pool. We have recently enjoyed our second stay with Liz and look forward to the next time.
We really enjoyed the decor of the room. It fit well with the style of home
This was a great place to stay.  Very clean, very central, very convenient location.  Liz was very responsive to our questions and requests. Would come back to this location without a question.
Very nice eclectic decor. Had everything we needed including cream and coffee. Really enjoyed our stay.
Very nice place in a good neighborhood. Liz is a very welcoming guest.

Had a fab night here on our way to Montreal to see relatives. Cosy quirky and comfortable we slept really well after what had been a very long travelling day! Easy walking distance of some nice restaurants and we went to the Tipsy Moose which was great fun and Chris really looked after us there.  Would definitely stay here again 😊
Chambre charmante et quartier paisible. J’y retournerais sans hésiter. Merci!

Wonderful place to stay!
Beautiful neighborhood and felt safe.
Super cute studio in a charming older home
Elizabeth was kind and commutative!!! Beautiful neighborhood
Loved Liz's place - very unique and charming. It had everything you could need, would definitely stay again!
Lovely place to stay in the Albany area and a great host. Thoroughly recommend. Thanks!
Perfect stay, 0 complaints. Really cool decor too

A clean and well stocked suite. Quiet, walkable neighborhood with access to main roads. Bonus, I hadn’t realized there was pool when we booked. Negatives: two safety concerns 1) there were multiple airbnbs in the unit, all of which seemed to have their keys in one lock box. Anyone could have let themselves into our suite prior to our arrival. Especially since the person before us hadn’t re-locked the lock box. 2) our suite didn’t have a doorknob. Just a hole in the door with a piece of paper taped over it. There was a deadbolt, but it still felt uncomfortable.
A very private and comfortable space. We were surprised by the outside garden and pool area.

This blue studio is adorable. It has a full size fridge. A mini kitchen with sink, double hot plate burner, all the pots/pans/ utensils and plates you could need. Microwave. There was more but i can not remember. The bed was comfortable not hard or soft. It felt like the perfect mini apartment. I wish i could rent this room out permanently.

Le indicazioni fornite da Elizabeth per trovare l'appartamento sono state molto utili. Il self check-in da libertà assoluta per l'arrivo. Angolo cucina molto fornito ed ideale per prepararsi pasti veloci. Migliorabile la pulizia generale dell'appartamento e necessarie alcune piccole manutenzioni.
Such a beautiful, peaceful space. Highly recommend!

Super étape sur notre route pour Montréal.
Excellente communication avec l'hôte, charmante et accueillante
Le studio décoré de façon rétro et atypique disposait de tout ce que l'on peut attendre avec une mention spéciale pour la literie

When I checked in, the lock seemed a little sketchy to get in and out. The place didn’t feel very clean. There’s a pool and the host left a note in the room saying feel free to use it. When I went to check it out, I saw a dead mouse in the pool.
After that, I left and told the host I’d like to cancel my stay. She did not respond so I called Airbnb support to get a refund.
The host eventually got back to me saying they just changed the locks and are fine and the dead creature was a chipmunk…. I have photographic evidence of a mouse, however, she completely dismissed my concern and reasons for not feeling comfortable.
She later sent me a long and very rude message verbally attacking me and saying I overreacted. So, not a great host….
This place was very pretty. Me and my friend stayed here and it was a very comfy cozy place. The backyard is beautiful!!
great spot!

The house was in a beautiful, peaceful, green area, wonderfully decorated and very clean. We never got to meet Elizabeth, but she was very helpful over the phone letting us leave our bags after check-out.
Adam was an excellent host. He was kind and considerate. I came to Albany for a hiking trip, and he even packed me a to-go lunch for my hike. Felt like home away from home!

Adam is such a wonderful host. So accommodating to whatever it is you might need. The food was excellent and you wont find a friendlier guy. Meeting people like him make my airbnb experiences much more valuable. Thanks again!
Adam is a great host. Picking me up from the station at midnight was a life saver and he even dropped me off at my school in the morning. I wish him all the best.

Adam is an excellent host and ready to help at any time. Arrived late and left early, he was kind enough to prepare takeaway boxes on my way out. Very nice place to stay. Clean and comfortable. Great location. The food is extremely good. Best hosting anywhere.

Adam is a great host.
Make sure you arrive hungry!
I couldn't imagine a better value. really nice vibe.

I appreciated Adam's generosity in picking me up and dropping me off at the Amtrak station, despite a last-minute change in my schedule. I was also thankful for the warm breakfast and lunch to go that he prepared. The room where I slept was small but adequate, with red walls and eccentric decoration. Fresh towels were tightly wrapped in plastic. The shared bathroom is down the hall. Adam visibly cares for his guests, as his meals and many reviews attest; however, the accommodations and cafe have the vibe more of an eclectic budget hostel with a few rough edges than a cozy home stay.
Adam is the most amazing host  I' e had. The food is delicious and his hospitality in unmatchable. Dwfinetely a great place to stay!
Great food! Very hospitable host and really cares about providing the best experience possible to his guests!!

This reservation was for my son, who was undertaking an internship at the State Capitol.  Adam was so gracious and welcoming and made sure that my son was comfortable and well cared for.  I would get calls from my son telling me how wonderful the experience was, especially the amazing food.  He will be back for the rest of the summer and is so excited.  I am truly thankful to have found Adam's place.

Fantastic value, delightful stay. As I think Adam says in the description, it's not a luxurious new swanky place. It feels like hostel living, in a good way. It's a charming old flat above a cafe, where you can enjoy the meals Adam prepares for you, according to your wishes. He couldn't be a more accommodating, gracious, welcoming host. I'm not in this part of the country very often, but if I ever am again, I'll hope there's space here.

Adam's place is probably the best Airbnb I've stayed at. He is incredibly welcoming and generous. Not only did he pick me up from the bus station, he also gave me a ride across town for an interview. He makes individual meals for each of his guests (depending on their gluten, fat, vegan, ect. preferences). His building has a cafe on the first floor where he prepares the meals. The place has a bohemian/international feel of a hostel. Even when I said that it was unnecessary for him to make me lunch because I wasn't staying for very long, he made me a brown bag lunch to go. I would have loved to stay another night but unfortunately, the place was booked, and now you know why. Thanks Adam, you are an amazing host.
Another great stay with Adam!  Excellent food included and even a ride to the train station!
That was a really good experience

Adam is very friendly and caring fellow who not only provides a clean place to stay bit also serves healthy and tasty food.  I would recommend this place to others who are not looking for a fancy place to stay, just a real friendly place.  Adam is very helpful and enjoys providing for his guests!

Great location and 3 free meals a day. Awesome host.
Adam even did my laundry and drove me to the airport.
Highly recommended.
Adam is a great host and I will always choose Adam over any 5 star hotel!
Adam is a great, and very friendly host. His airbnb is clean, tidy, and offers many amenities. I felt very confortable and well fed. Private parking was a great addition.

Adam is the best host ever! He  picked me up at the airport, took me to my bar exam site and back, made me three meals a day. He relieved all my worries about how to travel to the right exam place on time and how to feed myself, so I could focus on my studies. I enjoy talking to him and I love every meal and dessert he made. I will come back again!
Adam is a great and caring guy.  A wonderful host who we highly recommend.
Loved staying at adam's place! The room was cozy and perfect, the meals were great, and he was very nice. Super undervalued in my brief experience doing airbnb
Adam est généreux, altruiste et souriant, que demander de plus ?
Adam is a doctor, he knows a lot of medical knowledge and how to make health food. His food is very delicious. He is a very kindhearted man. Hope to here again.

Thanks for Adam's hospitality. I feel at home during the four-month stay. Adam's room is clean and beautiful with styllish decoration. You can have access to convenient transportation here, too. And the best thing is his delicous dinner because you won't forget it easily once you have a try.
Adam was very welcoming and generous. The food was delicious and he went out of his way to take me to the airport for a very early flight. I'd stay there again!

Was in town for a brief stay, for the price was a great find.
Location - Suburban town, so Uber/Lyft are best bets for getting around, probably not an area that you would wander at night, but everything in Albany is roughly 10-15m away from each other.
Price - great price, breakfast included - Adam made me a crepe each morning, with tea and a small brownie. He texted me a picture in the morning.
Host extremely responsive.
What's Included: Bed, 2 pillows, bed sheets, room was sufficiently warmed with a heateing unit in the room, Desk, office chair, regular chair, Closet w/ Hangers, Bath towel and Face towel
2 restrooms upstairs - 1 just w/ toilet, 1 w/ toilet and standing shower
Ambience - location is a room w/ private lock on door and resident entrance from the back of the Cafe. Room is a decent size with 2 lights, 2 electrical outlets on either side of the room (1 right above bed, 1 by the desk)
1 window w/ blinds facing a brick wall
Room is located upstairs, there is a small kitchen with stove top, oven, microwave and sink.
Room has a Hardwood floor with carpet
Older home setting, but perfect for a traveler on a budget.

Adam's place is my favorite place to stay in the Albany region. The food and the house are perfect. The apartment is clean, warm and cozy with many nice personal touches. The food is organic, tasty and quite healthy. Fully recommend. Adam is a perfect host and is very friendly.
Great experience, great hospitality and breakfast.

This was definitely a unique experience! Adam made me a very delicious breakfast both mornings. I think this would be a great place to rent with a friend or relative in the other bedroom. The bed was warm and I slept like a rock! :)
Good location and great hospitality !
His place is very good. He is very hospitable

Adam’s place had the feel the hostels I’ve traveled to abroad. I enjoyed my time at his air B&b. It’s a great place, worth the value. Adam will make you breakfast every morning and offers you organic food (Lunch and dinner) at a fraction of the cost you’d pay anywhere else.
Adam is the best host I have stayed with. Food is amazing and he is very helpful with requests. Enjoyed the place and food. Fully recommend to anyone.
Great value for traveller or student. Lives up to its description. Be sure to check if the room has A/C for summer.
Adam was great-very easy to communicate with, available 24/7. He also was kind enough to drive me to a nearby town. Thank you

Great experience! The host is an intellectual doctor who speaks in multiple languages. There's a PRIVATE restaurant on the first floor, free breakfast every morning that will be a surprise! A menu in your room with eclectic foods, some French, some Turkish, all unique. Order and get your food delivered right to your room! There is a kitchen if you prefer to make your own meal.
But, this is not your typical Airbnb. It's a hostel. The house is rustic. Surfaces are painted over. You get a private room and shared bathroom. Clean bed. Guests should be courteous to each other and clean up after themselves in shared spaces, always. The cost to stay is cheap. You are not paying for a maid. It's a different experience than what you're used to. But stay affordably, ask a little about culture, and enjoy the food!

I had a bit of a personal issue that came up the day of my trip to Adam's place and I was going to miss my expected window of arrival by nearly 8 hours. Adam was understanding of my situation and stayed up late just to let me in at night. Adam also made me a sausage egg and cheese sandwich for breakfast on my way out. This man is a good man and treats his travelers as good friends.
Adam was very professional and his place is exactly as described. Will stay here again.
Expect great hospitality and great conversation. Awesome guy very helpful. The meals are amazing. Can't wait to stay again.
I stayed at Adam’s place briefly for one night and I had a good night of sleep! Adam was kind and the location was close to downtown with convient public transportation too!
Great breakfast and location
Adam's home is conveniently located near shopping, churches and such. A cozy place and good value.

Adam was an incredible host. Not only did he pick me up from the train station, but he got out of the car and was waiting in the train station when I arrived.
He serves you food but also gave me snacks so I wouldn’t have to go out and buy them.
Very kind and hospitable!!
Definitely recommend!!
Great place to lay your head. Adam is very nice and offers breakfast. Quick and east check in
Stayed here twice already and had a great experienc! Adam is an awesome hostand very kind
Adam is definitely the best host !!! I recommend
Nothing fancy, but a good budget room to live in.
The room is exactly as Adam had described it. I found it very comfortable and Adam is an exceptional host
The place is just like the photos, comfortable, great location! Adam is super kind and helpful. The breakfast was delicious! Thank you.
Another great stay at Adam's place. Adam continue to be an exceptional host. I worked the  night shift and Adam prepared me breakfast in the afternoon to accommodate my schedule.

I had a smooth and comfortable stay at Adam. I kinda had an idea of the location already. Adam reassured me regarding the street parking. Check-in was smooth. Plenty of coffee was available and I needed access to printer that Adam provided gladly. He allowed me to hang out for a couple of hours extra at his Cafe downstairs as well. The place is simple and value for money. Its what I had wanted for a night's sleep and it worked out perfectly for me. Wonderful and friendly host.

It's a very comfortable place to stay!
He really helped me stay comfortable! Thanks to the breakfast he prepared every morning, I was able to start the day briskly🙂 If you have to stay in Albany, I recommend this place👍🏻👍🏻
Thank you very much Adam,
I felt really comfortable during my stay there👍🏻🍀
Always be healthy and happy🙂
Good luck with you:)
Great place to stay and great host.
Adams a great host. I work night shift and he realize that I wasn’t much for breakfast after working so it didn’t make me breakfast instead he’s made me a dinner to take to work with me me. Great guy
Good value for the price.
The room was exactly as expected.
Adam is the best host. He goes out of his way to personalize  my stay!
Value for the money. Adam was very accommodating.

This place was a fantastic value if your on a budget. The owner is extremely nice and even did my laundry. Breakfast is also available. Please read the description carefully. The neighborhood is a little rundown but very close to large supermarket and right on the main bus line.
Thanks for everything Adam!!

As described, Adam is a very welcoming and warm host. He was waiting for me when I arrived which made me feel comfortable right away, and he sent me off with a delicious and generous breakfast sandwich to go. Adam also communicated quickly and clearly which really helps. The room was exactly as described and the single bed was very comfortable, and there were thoughtful touches in the room. The fan keeps the room quite comfortable even in the heat wave. My only wish for improvement would be that the common areas, bathrooms, kitchen counters, were cleaner. Adam does a great job with the description. Thanks Adam!
great host

Adam is completely upfront in the listing and in private messages prior to booking about what kind of accommodation you'll be paying for. It is truly a hostel. Cleanliness can sometimes be dependent on other guests so be courteous.
I had no issue parking directly in front at any time of day. The neighborhood isn't that bad. Walking distance to Shoprite.
Adam graciously made me a packed breakfast at 6am so I could be at work by 7am. I looked forward to the little surprise extras he would include. Also, if I needed something printed, he had no problem letting me use his computer to print something out.
All of it was much appreciated.
My go-to place when I’m visiting Albany. Thanks Adam for the vegan breakfast & delicious coffee!

My room was comfortable and had an excellent light source and comfortable reading chair. I also enjoyed the daily breakfast.
Adam MD is honest about expectations of his humble abode.
Adam is a very hospitable, clean and accommodating guest. He made sure everything was spot-on at all times and provided many amenities. Couldn’t have chosen a better host for my first stay in Albany!
room was clean and every other things are working great. +breakfast :)
Second time I stayed here. Great value! Will definitely stay here again if I'm back in town.
Amazing spot, incredible host

I really recommend Adam's airbnb.
Easy access from the downtown even by public transportation.
The building is concise bit fully equipped.
I want this room in all cities I visit.
And I got a free breakfast :P

Adam is a great host. He was comfortable in conversation, but he waited until I initiated it. Breakfast was delicious! Room was small but clean and comfortable. It was exactly what he described. Not a 5 star hotel, but that wasn't what I paid for. :-)

Adam gives you a heads up of his place before he confirms your booking which is great. What you see is what you get. Had no problem finding parking right in front of his place.  His free breakfast was really nice

Read the description carefully. This is not a five-star accommodation. It is however, a comfortable and affordable place to stay close to downtown Albany. Adam is an excellent host and an even better person. He provided a complementary breakfast every morning and was quick to respond to messages.
I have stayed at Adam's place for more times than I can count on two hands.  Adam is the best! Parking is easy, and the location is central.  I certainly will stay here again :D
it's a great place especially for such a low price ❤️❤️❤️
Highly recommended. Adam is a wonderful host, and the room & breakfast are great.

booked this stay based on price/location. honestly it felt sketchy from the get go...old/worn down building (rooms/restrooms) actually for sale, commom areas are locked down, unsafe part of town (skid row). unable to sleep (a long term renter kept chatting loudly all night long) this place is unsafe, unhygienic, does not belong on Airbnb...unable to recommend.
One of the great host ever! You should stay his place!
Adam is great & the energy is wonderful in his house i experienced great sleep & no nightmares !!! Very much healing
Great guy! He prepares breakfast for you! Nice and honest guy! I’ll definitely recommend his place. Thanks Doc Adam!
Nice place. Lowest price.
Adam is very helpful and kind. good place to rest.
Great breakfast and quiet rest at Adam’s! Thank you for the hospitality.
Great place to stay. Very quiet and comfortable.
Very nice and easy to communicate

Your personal room is really clean and comfortable but the public rooms are a little messy.
Adam is a very nice guy and will help if something is not clear.
Great place to stay. Quiet and comfortable

Adam is a gracious and very communicative host. Left me breakfast and a packed lunch at 6:45am every morning. Definitely read the description because this is not somewhere to stay if you are fussy about cleanliness, etc. But very good value and a very nice host - I would stay here if I came to Albany again.
Great price for a solo traveler on a quick trip. Didn’t miss the AC.
what makes us good.
Adams place was as described. He was very helpful and responsive. He went above and beyond to help with everything.
Adam is very hospitable and helpful
Accommodating host

Adam is a super kind, considerate, and friendly host! Thank you for driving me and another guest to the exam site & providing us with decent food during our stay! Highly recommended for other visitors!

Nick and Liz's place is comfortable and welcoming. Nick communicated well before and during my stay, check-in was a snap, and the house had everything I needed -- microwave, teapot, fridge, good wifi, hot water with good pressure. The other guest I met was welcoming and friendly. Everything was very clean. The dog, Bella, is energetic and affectionate. One thing I would pass on -- and it's a delicate matter and a structural characteristic of the house, not anyone's fault -- is that the stairwell going up to the bedrooms is very, very narrow. I am a thin person and handled it fine, but if I were an obese person I might not have been able to fit in that staircase.
Great place to stay. Accurate, friendly, close to everything. Great host.

This was a great place to stay! The location was great, it was very clean, Nick was so hospitable. He provided everything needed for a wonderful stay. Next time I'm in Albany I'll definitely stay there again.
Great place!
Goede prijs kwaliteit en gezellig.

Cozy is the perfect word to describe the house and the room we stayed in. Although we never met Nick & Liz, they seemed to be more than happy to tend to any needs we may have. We had a smaller room but it had all the essentials and it was more than satisfactory. We had a great stay and are definitely looking to check out their other rooms in the future!
Great place and great hospitality.
I had a nice and comfortable stay with Nicholas and Liz. Communication and check-in was easy, house is centrally located. I recommend.
